title: Dončić kljub zelo slabem metu iz igre na robu trojnega dvojčka
description: Luka Dončić in Los Angeles Lakersi so se sredi naporne serije šestih tekem v osmih dneh soočili s San Antonio Spursi. Luka Dončić je bil strelsko zelo nerazpoložen, a pozornost nasprotnikov je izkoristil in z izjemnimi podajami skrbel za soigralce. Lakersi so zmagali 125:109, Dončić pa je zbral 21 točk, 9 skokov in 14 asistenc.
title_translated: Doncic despite a very bad throw from the game on the edge of a triple twin
description_translated: Luka Doncic and Los Angeles Lakers have faced San Antonio Spurs in the middle of the arduous series of matches in eight days. Luka Doncic was very unprecedented, but he used the attention of his opponents and took care of his teammates with exceptional passes. The Lakers won 125: 109, and Doncic collected 21 points, 9 rebounds and 14 assists.

title: 'Led se je stalil pod našimi nogami': Ikonična fotografija haskijev, ki je preplavila splet
description: Junija 2019 je splet preplavila fotografija haskijev, ki 'hodijo' po vodi. Podnebni znanstvenik Steffen Olsen je posnel to osupljivo fotografijo haskijev. Zdi se, da psi hodijo po vodi, a gre za iluzijo. Fotografija pa je hitro postala viralna. Razkrila je resničnost podnebnih sprememb in hitrost taljenja ledu na Grenlandiji. Olsen se danes, ko se je podnebna kriza še poglobila, spominja trenutka, ko je posnel ikonično fotografijo.
title_translated: 'LED melted under our feet': an iconic photo of the husky that flooded the web
description_translated: In June 2019, the web was flooded with a photo of Huskys who 'walk' the water. Climate scientist Steffen Olsen took this stunning photo of Husky. Dogs seem to walk the water, but it is an illusion. The photo, however, quickly became viral. It revealed the truth of climate change and the speed of ice melting in Greenland. Olsen today, when the climate crisis has deepened, remembers the moment when he took an iconic photo.

Osrednja tema pogovorov bo vojna v Ukrajini. ZDA si prizadevajo za njen čimprejšnji konec in so v ta namen tudi predlagale 30-dnevno prekinitev ognja. V Kijevu so jo podprli, Putin pa je ob načelni podpori izrazil zadržke.

title: Zunanji bazen odprli že sredi marca, nekateri zaplavali kar v kostumih
description: V vodi bom ostal kar do poletja. Tako se je na najbolj zgodnjo otvoritev zunanjega bazena v Nemčiji, odzval eden od obiskovalcev. Bazen namreč vsako leto odprejo sredi marca, ne glede na to, ali termometri kažejo, da je zunaj pod ničlo ali 20 stopinj Celzija. Zgodnjega odprtja bazena se vsako leto udeleži množica plavalcev, nekateri kar v pižamah.
title_translated: Outdoor pool opened in mid -March, some swim in costumes
description_translated: I will stay in the water until summer. Thus, one of the visitors responded to the earliest opening of the outdoor pool in Germany. The pool is opened every year in mid -March, whether thermometers show that it is outside the nine or 20 degrees Celsius. Early opening of the pool, there are many swimmers, some in the pizamas.

title: 7500 zaposlenih v Volkswagnovem Audiju bo do leta 2029 ob službo
description: Volkswagnov Audi bo do leta 2029 v Nemčiji odpustil do 7500 zaposlenih na področjih, kot sta administracija in razvoj. Ukrepi, ki so del Volkswagnovega programa zmanjševanja stroškov, naj bi jim prihranili milijardo evrov na leto.
title_translated: 7500 employees in Volkswagen's Audi will be by 2029 by the service
description_translated: By 2029, Volkswagen Audi will dismiss up to 7500 employees in the fields such as administration and development. Measures that are part of Volkswagen's cost reduction program are expected to save billion euros a year.

title: Med žrtvami novopečeni očka, mlada mamica, od izčrpanosti umrl tudi reševalec ...
description: V Severni Makedoniji žalujejo za umrlimi v požaru, ki je v soboto izbruhnil v diskoteki v Kočanih. Med 59 žrtvami so trije mladoletniki, najmlajša žrtev je imela komaj 14 let. Med njimi so tudi člani zasedbe, ki je nastopala v klubu, več mladih športnikov, pa novopečeni očka, ki je tiste usodne noči praznoval rojstvo otroka. Makedonski mediji poročajo tudi o vozniku reševalnega vozila, ki je vso noč prevažal poškodovane, nato pa od izčrpanosti in stresa tudi sam umrl.
title_translated: Among the stars of the newly mom, young mommy, the resort also died from the outbreak ...
description_translated: In Northern Macedonia, they are stalled by the dead in Posro, who erupted on Saturday at a disco in Kocani. There are three minors among the 59 Zrtova, and the youngest of the staff was barely 14 years old. Among them are the members of the band, who performed at the club, and more young sportsmen, as well as a new man who celebrated that fateful night the birth of a baby. The Macedonian media also reports the driver of the reservoir, who transported all over the night, and then died from the outbreak and stress himself.

title: So obrambni izdatki razpoka v koaliciji?
description: Ali so pred koalicijo razpoke, ki jih bodo Gibanje Svoboda, SD in Levica le leto dni pred volitvami težko premostili? Ali se bo vladna koalicija začela krhati? Na mizi bo namreč, prej ali slej, vprašanje o višjih obrambnih izdatkih. Se je koalicija tej razpravi na vrhu izognila, ker njeni volivci temu v glavnem nasprotujejo in se koalicijske stranke bojijo, da bodo z razpravo o dvigu obrambnih izdatkov izgubile priljubljenost pred volitvami? Je nova obdavčitev nepremičnin, ki je na noge dvignila javnost, pozabljena? Kakšna bo pokojninska reforma?
title_translated: Are defensive expenditure in the coalition?
description_translated: Are the cracks before the coalition that the freedom, SD and the Left will only overcome a year before the elections? Will the government coalition start to break? It will be on the table, sooner or later, a question about higher defense expenditures. Has the coalition avoided this debate at the top because its voters mainly oppose it and coalition parties fear that by discussing the rise in defense expenditure they will lose their popularity before the elections? Is a new taxation of real estate that has raised the public to the public, forgotten? What will be the pension reform?

description_translated: In addition to psychoactive drugs that are labeled with a red or empty triangle, the ability to drive can also be affected by some antidepressants and other frequent drugs.

title_translated: Crashed a private aircraft: Seven people died, including a local famous musician

description: Na Finskem so raziskovali potrošniške navade svojih državljanov. Pri tem so se izkristalizirale zanimive ugotovitve. Že več kot polovica Fincev kupuje manj. In to ne le zaradi naraščajočih življenjskih stroškov, ampak so kot razlog številni navedli podnebne razloge. Zaradi zavedanja o podnebni krizi, so se tako pripravljeni odpovedati delu nakupov.

And not only because of the increasing cost of living, but many have cited climate reasons. Because of the awareness of the climate crisis, they are thus willing to give up the part of purchases.

title: 'Vojna proti podganam': prebivalci nad glodavce z zračnimi puškami
description: Na nizozemskem otoku se odvija nenavadna misija. Oboroženi z zračnimi puškami so se prebivalci lotili reševanja vse večjega problema - podgan, ki so se nenadzorovano razmnožile in predstavljajo grožnjo pticam, ki gnezdijo na otoku. Da je zadeva še kako resna, dokazujejo urjenja. Po zaključenih treningih streljanja prebivalci postanejo lovci na podgane z enim samim ciljem - čim prej iztrebiti te trdožive in inteligentne glodavce. Kako dolgo že traja vojna proti podganam in komu bolje kaže na bojišču?
title_translated: 'War against rats': Residents over rods with air rifles
description_translated: An unusual mission is taking place on the Netherlands. Armed with air rifles, residents have dealt with an increasing problem - rats that have reproduced uncontrollably and pose a threat to birds nesting on the island. The fact that the matter is still serious is evidenced by training. After the shooting training is completed, residents become rats hunters with a single goal - to exterminate these stubborn and intelligent rodents as soon as possible. How long does the war go against the rats and who is better shown on the battlefield?

title: 'Najhuje je bilo v trenutkih, ko so žarki upanja na rešitev, izhlapeli'
description: Norveški reševalec je preživetje 39-letnega Slovenca, ki ga je na severu Norveške pokopal snežni plaz, označil za čudež. Patrik Jagunić je bil sedem ur zasut dva metra pod snegom in si je najprej z enim, nato pa z dvema prstoma odstranjeval sneg okoli sebe, da je ustvaril zračni žep, se dokopal do telefona in poklical reševalce. Trajalo je, da ga je reševalni pes Whiskey zavohal in da so ga odkopali. Plaz je pred tednom dni zasul tri Slovence, dva sta preživela, 50-letnica pa je še vedno pogrešana. Patrik Jagunić se je od takrat že vrnil domov, na naša vprašanja pa je odgovarjal v oddaji 24UR ZVEČER.
title_translated: 'The worst was when the rays of hope of the solution evaporated'
description_translated: The Norwegian rescuer described the survival of a 39-year-old Slovenian, buried in the north of Norway, a snow avalanche as a miracle. Patrik Jagunic was two meters under the snow for seven hours, and first with one, then removing the snow around him with two fingers to create an air pocket, got to the phone and called rescuers. It took him to smell him the Whiskey rescue dog and to dug it. The avalanche was overwhelmed by three Slovenes a week ago, two survived, and the 50-year-old is still missing. Patrik Jagunić has ever returned home and has answered our questions on 24 hours in the evening.

Tik pred odločanjem o zakonu, ki naj bi ostro ločil med javnim in zasebnim v zdravstvu, čemur zdravniški ceh kategorično nasprotuje, ministra poslance pozivata, naj umaknejo del, ki koncesionarjem prepoveduje izplačevanje dobičkov. Just before deciding on a law that is intended to distinguish between public and private in healthcare, which is categorically opposed by medical guild, the ministers urge the Members to withdraw a part that prohibits concessionaires from paying profits. Will coalition MPs relent? And how does the complication commented on the first man of the Golobic Strategic Council Erik Brecelj?

Pesem Kemija je prvi singel novega albuma, ki ga bo vrhniški raper izdal jeseni in s tem obeležil 15-letnico svojega glasbenega ustvarjanja. Duet z mlado pevko in radijsko voditeljico Majo Tasić je hkrati tudi pot v novo glasbeno smer, kljub izrazito balkanskim ritmom je namreč celotno besedilo v slovenščini.

title: V Planici poseben sestanek o skakalnih dresih: na vidiku spremembe #video
description: Po aferi z dresi na nordijskem SP v Trondheimu so odgovorni na Podkomiteju za opremo in razvoj na Mednarodni smučarski zvezi (FIS) razpravljali o smernicah glede prihodnosti. Potegnili so črto pod dogajanje in predstavili določene ukrepe za prihodnost. V ospredju je transparentnost, izpostavlja Gorazd Pogorelčnik, ki je še poudaril, da bodo morali v naslednjih štirinajstih dnevih preučiti predloge in se nato že v veliki meri na sestanku v Pragi odločiti.
title_translated: In Planica a special meeting about jumping jerseys: in the view of change
description_translated: Following the Nordic World Cup affair in Trondheim, they were responsible for subcutaneous and development at the International Ski Association (FIS) guidelines for the future. They pulled the line below the event and presented certain actions for the future. Transparency is at the forefront, emphasizes Gorazd Pogorelčnik, who further emphasized that they will have to examine proposals in the next fourteen days and then make a large extent at a meeting in Prague.

title: Nejc Žnidarčič, slovenski športnik, ki ima kar 29 medalj s svetovnih prvenstev #video
description: Ko večina športnikov pri štiridesetih že uživa zasluženi pokoj, Nejc Žnidarčič, kajakaš na divjih vodah, še vedno blesti na največjih tekmovanjih. Z neverjetnimi 29 medaljami s svetovnih prvenstev dokazuje, da so leta le številka in da na koncu še najbolj štejejo ljubezen do športa, motivacija, trdo delo in dobesedno žulji na rokah. Njegov poklic je včasih zelo naporen, a meni, da ima eno najlepših služb na svetu. In Nejc jo očitno že dolga leta odlično opravlja.
title_translated: Nejc Žnidarčič, Slovenian athlete who has as many as 29 medals from the World Championships
description_translated: When most athletes already enjoy the well -deserved retirement, Nejc Žnidarčič, you kayak on wild waters, still shine in the biggest competitions. With an incredible 29 medals from the World Championships, he proves that years are just a number and that in the end they are most considered to be the love of sports, motivation, hard work and literally blisters on the hands. His profession is sometimes very tiring, but he believes that he has one of the most beautiful jobs in the world. And Nejc has obviously been doing it great for many years.

title: Igralcu Klemnu Slakonji goljufi izpraznili račun
description: Igralec in pevec Klemen Slakonja je po naših informacijah zaradi bančne goljufije utrpel škodo v višini skoraj 10.000 evrov. Informacijo smo preverili tudi pri Slakonji, ki je finančno oškodovanje potrdil, zaenkrat pa ne želi dajati izjav za medije, dokler je primer še v preiskavi.
title_translated: Actor Klemen Slakonji fraudulent bills
description_translated: Actor and singer Klemen Slakonja, according to our information, suffered damage of almost € 10,000 due to bank fraud. We also checked the information at Slakonja, who has confirmed financial damage, but so far he does not want to make media statements as long as the case is still under investigation.

title: Pleši, kot da jih imaš dvajset!
description: Upokojena Američanka s Floride je osupnila prijatelje in znance ter za svoj 100. rojstni dan zaplesala kot mladostnica. Častitljivi jubilej so v domu starejših, kjer gospa Dolly živi, praznovali na prav poseben način: v slogu divjih dvajsetih. In kako so se zabavali mladi po srcu?
title_translated: Dance like you have twenty!
description_translated: A retired American from Florida stunned friends and acquaintances and danced as an adolescent for her 100th birthday. The venerable jubilee was celebrated in the nursing home, where Mrs. Dolly lives, in a very special way: in the style of twenty. And how did young people have fun at heart?

title: 'Otrokova prva izkušnja, ko se nekomu zaupa o nasilju, je zelo pomembna'
description: "Rdeči alarm za slovensko družbo," je po tem, ko je videl nove grozljive posnetke medvrstniškega nasilja, dejal ravnatelj ene izmed ptujskih šol. V oddaji 24UR ZVEČER sta o medvrstniškem nasilju spregovorili Tatjana Pleško Zalar, ravnateljica mladinskega doma Malči Beličeve, in Bojana Kračan iz Uprave kriminalistične policije. Kračanova je izpostavila pomen pogovora o nasilju, Pleško Zalarjeva pa dodala, da je otrokova prva izkušnja, ko se nekomu zaupa o nasilju, izjemno pomembna.
title_translated: 'The child's first experience when someone is trusted about violence is very important'
description_translated: "The red alarm for Slovenian society," said the headmaster of one of the Ptuj schools after seeing new horrific recordings of peer violence. Tatjana Pleško Zalar, director of the Malči Beličeva Youth Home, and Bojana Kracan of the Criminal Police Directorate, spoke about the 24 hours in the evening. Kračanova emphasized the importance of talking about violence, and Zalar added that the child's first experience, when trusted about violence, is extremely important.

title: Tanja Žagar o izgubi las: Največ mi pomeni, ko mi Miki in otroka rečejo, da sem lepa
description: Tanja Žagar nedvomno velja za enega od sinonimov slovenske zabavne glasbe. Že tri desetletja namreč navdušuje slovensko občinstvo – sprva kot članica dekliške skupine Foxy Teens, zdaj pa že 20 let kot samostojna izvajalka. Studio POPkasta je pevka obiskala pred veliko vrnitvijo na slovenske glasbene odre.
title_translated: Tanja Žagar about hair loss: the most means to me when Miki and the baby tell me that I am beautiful
description_translated: Tanja Žagar is undoubtedly considered one of the synonyms of Slovenian entertainment music. It has been impressing the Slovenian audience for three decades - initially as a member of the Foxy Teens Girl Group, and has now been a independent contractor for 20 years. The poppy studio visited the singer before a big return to Slovenian music stages.

title: Slovenca bosta del dvoboja med ZDA in državami nekdanje Jugoslavije

description_translated: The basketball world has received a great sensation. The long -awaited exhibition showdown between US basketball players and countries from the former common state are confirmed. It will also feature Slovenian national teams Luka Dončić and Klemen Prepelič.

Tudi v SLO že imamo nekaj izkušenj s tem (Janša 2014, oproščen 2015). Nevarna igra.” Vir: XThe post Dr. Dejan Verčič: Ti trendi so skrb vzbujajoči appeared first on Demokracija.

title: Celovčanom je uspelo
description: Hokejisti Salzburga, ki branijo naslov prvaka lige Ice, so danes dobili finalnega tekmeca. To je Celovec (Jan Muršak in Luka Gomboc po poškodbah nista igrala), ki je bil na odločilni sedmi tekmi polfinala z 2:0 boljši od Linza (Ken Ograjenšek, Luka Maver). Muršak se je po poškodbi vrnil na treninge, a danes še ni zaigral.
title_translated: The Klagenfurts succeeded
description_translated: Salzburg hockey players who defend the Ice League championship title today won the final rival. This is Klagenfurt (Jan Muršak and Luka Gomboc did not play after injuries), who was 2-0 better than Linz (Ken Ograjenšek, Luka Maver) in the decisive seventh game of the semi -finals. Muršak returned to training after the injury, but has not played today.

title: Kaj proži plaz groženj in incidentov v slovenskih šolah?
description: Ljubljanska policija je potrdila, da je bila obveščena o domnevnem sumu groženj v okolju ene izmed izobraževalnih ustanov. Neuradno naj bi nekdo grozilni mejl poslal ravnateljici osnovne šole Majde Vrhovnik. Na eni od osnovnih šol na Koroškem naj bi medtem učenec v torbi sošolca opazili nož in o tem seznanil učiteljico. Otrok noža v šoli sicer ni razkazoval, prav tako z njim ni nikomur grozil.
title_translated: What triggers an avalanche of threats and incidents in Slovenian schools?
description_translated: Ljubljana police confirmed that it had been informed of the alleged suspicion of threats in the environment of one of the educational institutions. Unofficially, someone is supposed to send the threatening mee to the headmaster of the elementary school Majda Vrhovnik. At one of the elementary schools in Carinthia, the student was expected to notice a knife in a classmate bag and informed the teacher about it. Although the child did not show the knife at school, he also did not threaten anyone.

title: Brez težav za osmega nosilca v Bukarešti
description: Argentinec Camilo Ugo, ki je na nedavnem turnirju v Miamiju moral priznati premoč Novaku Đokoviću v šestnajstini finala, je danes uspešno začel z nastopi v Bukarešti. Tam je osmi nosilec, v prvem krogu pa je gladko opravil z nepostavljenim Moldavcem Radujem Albotom. V osmini finala ga zdaj čaka spopad z avstrijskim kvalifikantom hrvaških korenin Filipom Mišolićem, ki je v prvem krogu izločil Kazahstanca Ševčenka. Avstralec O'Connell je bil v dveh nizih boljši od Srba Lajovića, v drugem krogu pa se bo pomeril s četrtim nosilcem, Čilencem Nicolasom Jarryjem. Ta je bil v prvem krogu prost. Več težav je imel v prvem krogu peti nosilec, Španec Roberto Bautista.
title_translated: No problem for the eighth carrier in Bucharest
description_translated: Argentinean Camilo Ugu, who had to acknowledge Novak Djokovic in the recent tournament in Miami in the sixteenth finals, successfully began appearances in Bucharest today. He is the eighth carrier there, and in the first round he did smoothly with uninvited Moldovac Radu Albot. In the eighth finals, he is now facing a clash with the Austrian Croatian root qualifying Filip Misolić, who eliminated Kazakhstanc Ševchenko in the first round. Australian O'Connell was better than Serb Lajovic in two sets, and in the second round he will compete with the fourth bracket, Chilean Nicolas Jarry. This one was free in the first round. In the first round, the fifth holder, Spaniard Roberto Bautista, had more problems.

title: EU udaril po avtomobilskem kartelu z visokimi kaznimi
description: Evropska komisija je 15 večjim avtomobilskim proizvajalcem in Evropskemu združenju proizvajalcev avtomobilov (ACEA) naložila globe v skupni višini 458 milijonov evrov zaradi kartelnega dogovarjanja glede recikliranja vozil. Vsa podjetja so priznala svojo vpletenost in pristala na poravnavo, so danes sporočili iz Bruslja.
title_translated: EU hit the high -penalty car cartel
description_translated: The European Commission has ordered 15 major car manufacturers and the European Automobile Association (ACEA) a total of EUR 458 million due to cartel collection on vehicle recycling. All companies acknowledged their involvement and agreed to the settlement, according to Brussels.

title: Pokojni sin nekdanjega bejzbolskega igralca naj bi umrl zaradi zastrupitve
description: Preiskovalni organi ocenjujejo, da je Miller Gardner, sin nekdanjega bejzbolskega igralca Bretta Gardnerja, med dopustovanjem v Kostariki umrl zaradi zastrupitve z ogljikovim monoksidom. Sprva so sicer domnevali, da bi bil vzrok smrti lahko zadušitev.
title_translated: The late son of a former baseball player is supposed to die from poisoning
description_translated: The investigating authorities estimate that Miller Gardner, the son of former baseball player Brett Gardner, died of carbon monoxide poisoning during his vacation in Costa Rica. At first, they assumed that the cause of death could be suffocation.

Bergant, Novak, Škerlep, Kuzman in Prevc oziroma tako imenovani Janezi z Denisom Avdićem na čelu, so z nastopoma v Mengšu nanizali že 100. ponovitev priljubljenega Festivalčka smeha.

Bergant, Novak, Škerlep, Kuzman and Prevc, or the so -called John with Denis Avdic at the helm, have already made 100 with performances in Mengš.

title: Račun za parkirnino na drugem koncu države, avto pa doma v garaži
description: Uporabniki aplikacije za parkiranje Easypark so bili razburjeni, ker jim je aplikacija sporočala, da jim zaračunava parkirnino za različna parkirišča, celo na drugem koncu države, čeprav je bil avto doma v garaži. Iz podjetja so takoj umirjali strasti, da imajo po vsej državi tehnične težave. Zato so morali v aplikaciji Easy Park začasno ustaviti možnost plačevanja parkirnine preko SMS sporočil. So vendarle ugotovili, kaj se dogaja? So uporabnikom aplikacije javljene zneske trgali z računa?
title_translated: Account for parking fees at the other end of the country and the car at home in the garage
description_translated: The users of the Easypark parking app were upset because the application informed them that they were charged for various parking lots, even on the other end of the country, although the car was home in the garage. The company immediately calmed the passions to have technical problems across the country. Therefore, they had to suspend the possibility of paying parking via SMS in the Easy Park application. But did they find out what was going on? Did the applications of the apps report the amounts of the account from the account?

They should also reject a request for president of the National Assembly of the Republic of Serbian Nenad Stevandic. Dodik is supposed to return to BiH in the meantime.

Več na Ekipa.si

Za nekoliko grenak priokus sta poskrbeli poškodbi Gabriela Magalhaesa in Jurriena Timberja, na katera Londončani morda ne bodo mogli računati v dvoboju z madridskim Realom.

Predsednik naj bi bil še naprej zadovoljen z Muskom in njegovim uradom za vladno učinkovitost (Doge), obenem pa naj bi oba sklenila, da je čas za slovo.

The value of the project is estimated at EUR 4.5 million and will be completed by the end of next year.

Zaradi fizičnih in psihičnih poškodb je postala zmedena, vzkipljiva in agresivna. Na kliniki je zdaj začela s poskusno ketaminsko terapijo, droga, ki jo jemlje pod nadzorom, pa ji, kot pravi, precej pomaga.

The 23-year-old Katya, who joined the Marines at the age of 19, suffered a concussion on each mission. Due to physical and psychological injuries, she has become confused, excessive and aggressive. She has now started with trial ketamine therapy at the clinic, and the drug she takes under control helps her, she says.

Govorice so se še posebej razvnele po tem, ko se je zvezdnica razšla z dolgoletnim partnerjem in se udeležila poroke Glenove sestre. After the wedding, Powell, when asked if he noticed that a visit to Sweeney at his sister's wedding aroused enthusiasm, replied in a joking tone: "It's crucial to capture the right moment, right?"

title: Zapravljamo popoplavne milijone za varnost ljudi ali za lasten zaslužek?
description: Dobro leto in pol po rušilnih poplavah. Kaj je bilo narejenega, zakaj se postopki vlečejo, hiše rušijo počasi, vodotoki pa betonirajo? Za popoplavno obnovo smo iz državne blagajne plačali več kot milijardo evrov. Samo za vodotoke preko 230 milijonov. Smo zato bolj varni pred novimi poplavami? Zapravljamo popoplavne milijone za varnost ljudi ali za lasten zaslužek? Kakšni so interesi v ozadju, kdo ima največje koristi? Predvsem pa: bomo še vedno ignorirali opozorila strokovnjakov?
title_translated: We are wasting a flooding millions for people's safety or for our own earnings?
description_translated: A good year and a half after devastating floods. What was done, why are the processes dragging, the houses are slowly demolished and the watercourses concrete? We paid more than a billion euros from the Treasury for a flooded renovation. For watercourses alone over 230 million. Are we therefore more safe from new floods? We are wasting a flooding millions for people's safety or for our own earnings? What are the interests in the background, who has the greatest benefits? Above all, will we still ignore experts' warnings?

Kljub temu je igralec mnenja, da znotraj že poznane zgodbe in okvirjev obstaja nekaj manevrskega prostora.
title_translated: Pierce Brosnan agrees with Helen Mirren that James Bond is sexist

Nevertheless, the actor is of the opinion that there is some room for maneuver within the already known story and frames.

title: Janković–Vučić: kaj je v ozadju trdnega zavezništva?

Med razlogi, zakaj se Janković ne distancira od politike svojega prijatelja, pa bi, kot pravi, lahko bili številni posli, ki jih je omogočil srbskemu kapitalu v Ljubljani. Nekdanji evropski poslanec Klemen Grošelj, ki ga je Vučić razglasil za sovražnika Srbije, medtem vladajočo politiko poziva k bolj odločnemu odzivu.
title_translated: Jankovic -Vučić: What is in the background of a solid alliance?
description_translated: The gesture of the Serbian president, who has a much greater echo in our country than in Serbia, damages the mayor of Ljubljana earlier than benefits, according to international relations researcher Faris Kočan. Among the reasons why Jankovic does not distance himself from his friend's politics, he says, he could be numerous businesses made possible by the Serbian capital in Ljubljana. Former MEP Klemen Grošelj, who was proclaimed by Vucic as an enemy of Serbia, while calling for a more determined response.

A kaj naredimo, ko nam zmanjka prostora v skrinji – ali pa je sploh nimamo? Odgovor se skriva v eni od najbolj klasičnih, a pogosto spregledanih tehnik: vlaganju v steklene kozarce!

But what do we do when we run out of space in the chest - or do we have no one at all? The answer lies in one of the most classic but often overlooked techniques: investing in glass jars!

Po vrnitvi med svoje najdražje je polna načrtov za prihodnost, od sodelovanj s slovenskimi chefi do izobraževanj v tujini, z veliko ljubezni pa že pripravlja lastne večerje na turistični kmetiji.

After returning among his loved ones, he is full of plans for the future, from collaborations with Slovenian chefs to training abroad, and with a lot of love he is already preparing her own dinner at the tourist farm.

title: 'Ponarejeno pogodbo sprejeli v nekaj minutah, za izbris potrebujejo več mesecev'
description: Da je neznana oseba na njegovem naslovu prijavila svoje prebivališče, je lastnik stanovanja v Ljubljani ugotovil šele, ko je bil postopek že izveden, upravna enota pa ga je o tem obvestila. Na Policijo je nemudoma podal kazensko ovadbo, na upravni enoti pa zahteval izbris nezakonite prijave. A čeprav so "ponarejeno pogodbo sprejeli v le nekaj minutah, brez moje prisotnosti ali overjene pogodbe, pa za izbris potrebujejo več mesecev", pravi oškodovani. Sprašuje se tudi, zakaj zakon dovoljuje tovrstne zlorabe in zakaj je njegov edini način obrambe, da odda zahtevo, da brez njegove fizične prisotnosti ni možno opraviti takšnih postopkov.
title_translated: 'Fake contract accepted within minutes, they take several months' to delete'
description_translated: The unknown person reported his residence at his address was only founded by the owner of the apartment in Ljubljana after the procedure had already been carried out and the administrative unit informed him. He immediately filed a criminal complaint with the police and requested the administrative unit to delete illegal applications. But although they have "accepted the fake contract in just a few minutes, without my presence or certified contract, it takes several months to delete," says the injured. He also wonders why the law allows such abuse and why his only defense method is to submit a request that such procedures cannot be performed without his physical presence.

title: V nesreči umrla družina iz Barcelone, tesno povezana z nogometnim klubom
description: V helikopterski nesreči v New Yorku je poleg pilota umrla petčlanska družina iz Barcelone, poročajo španski mediji. V ameriškem velemestu so bili na počitnicah, neuradno naj bi eden od otrok praznoval rojstni dan. Starša treh otrok sta bila zaposlena v španski podružnici nemškega tehnološkega podjetja Siemens. Augustin Escobar je bil do nedavnega tudi glavni izvršni direktor. Njegova soproga Merce Camprubi Montal medtem prihaja iz znane družine iz Barcelone. Njena dedek in pradedek sta bila nekoč predsednika slovitega nogometnega kluba Barcelona.
title_translated: In the crash, the died family from Barcelona, ​​closely related to the football club
description_translated: In the New York helicopter accident, a five -member Barcelona family died in addition to the pilot, Spanish media reported. They were on vacation in the US metropolis, unofficially, one of the children is expected to celebrate their birthday. The parents of three children were employed by the Spanish branch of the German technology company Siemens. Until recently, Augustin Escobar was also CEO. His wife Merce Camprubi Montal, meanwhile, comes from a famous Barcelona family. Her grandfather and great -grandfather were once presidents of the famous Barcelona football club.

They propose that the administrative court erase the name Democrats from the register and prohibit the operation under that name. Logar believes that the lawsuit is unfounded.

title: Newcastle s prepričljivo zmago na tretje mesto
description: Na zaostali tekmi 29. kroga angleškega nogometnega prvenstva je Newcastle povsem nadigral Crystal Palace in ga premagal s 5:0. S peto zaporedno prvenstveno zmago - zadnjič je izgubil 26. februarja proti Liverpoolu, se je prebil na tretje mesto prvenstvene lestvice, dve točki pred Nottingham Forest.
title_translated: Newcastle with a convincing victory in third place
description_translated: In a back games 29. The round of the English football championship, Newcastle completely outplayed Crystal Palace and beat it 5-0. With the fifth consecutive championship victory - the last time he lost 26. February against Liverpool, he made his way to third place in the championship rankings, two points ahead of Nottingham Forest.

title: Real Madrid še drugič nemočen proti Arsenalu, Bayern bližje preobratu
description: Po torkovih precej nenadejanih spektaklih ter napredovanju Barcelone in PSG v polfinale lige prvakov sta se z nič manj drame razpletli še sredini povratni četrtfinalni tekmi. Inter je v Milanu branil prednost z 2:1, Bayern iz Münchna je imel na tekmi številnih priložnosti na obeh straneh do zadnjega možnosti, a tretjega gola ni zmogel doseči. Tekma se je končala z rezultatom 2:2 in Inter je napredoval s 3:2. Medtem je Arsenal s skupnim izidom 5:1 izločil favorizirani Real Madrid. Ta je bil še enkrat nemočen proti topničarjem, ki so zmagali z 2:1. Polfinalna para sta Arsenal - PSG, Inter - Barcelona.
title_translated: Real Madrid for the second time helpless against Arsenal, Bayern closer to turnaround
description_translated: After Tuesday's rather unprocessed spectacles and the advancement of Barcelona and PSG in the Semifinals of the Champions League, they made their way back with no less drama in the middle of the return quarterfinal match. Inter defended the lead in Milan by 2: 1, Bayern from Munich had many opportunities on both sides to the last option in the match, but could not score the third goal. The match ended with a score of 2: 2 and Inter advanced 3: 2. Meanwhile, Arsenal eliminated the favored Real Madrid with a total score of 5: 1. This one was again helpless against the artillerymen who won 2: 1. The semi -final pairs are Arsenal - PSG, Inter - Barcelona.

Začel ga je kot novopečeni očka, ravno na svoj 23. rojstni dan, tako da je bila sreča v družini še bolj nepopisna, nato pa Celjanom pomagal do zgodovinskega uspeha v Evropi. Pridobil si je naziv kralja asistenc, blestel tudi na srečanju v Firencah (2:2) in še enkrat dokazal, da predstavlja še kako svetlo prihodnost slovenskega nogometa.
title_translated: Svit Seslar: It was the biggest match of my career
description_translated: This is an extraordinary year of Seslar. He started it as a newly born dad, just on his 23th birthday, so that happiness in the family was even more indescribable, and then helped Celje to historical success in Europe. He obtained the title of King of Assistenc, also shone at a meeting in Florence (2: 2), and once again proved that it represents a bright future for Slovenian football.

Coachella in prihajajoči festivali pa niso le glasbeno obarvani, temveč tudi modno. To je odlična priložnost, da posamezniki zasijejo s svojimi edinstvenimi in odbitimi stajlingi. V tem času je videla in doživela marsikaj, delala je za najbogatejše ljudi na svetu, ki besede nemogoče ne poznajo. Ravno zaradi vseh svojih izkušenj se je odločila, da bo, ko bo končala to kariero, pomagala mladim, ki razmišljajo, da bi delo poiskali v tujini. Z individualnimi svetovanji nudi podporo tistim, ki želijo narediti korak v mednarodnem okolju.

It was because of all her experiences that she decided that when she finishes her career, she would help young people who are thinking of finding work abroad. Through individual counseling, it provides support to those who want to take a step in the international environment.

title: Pred kongresom SLS odločitev o vodstvu stranke
description: Člani SLS bodo na kongresu v Slovenski Bistrici danes odločali o vodstvu, ki jih bo popeljalo na naslednje volitve v DZ. Za vodenje stranke se ob aktualnem predsedniku Marku Balažicu potegujeta še Tina Bregant in Nina Strah. Delegati pa bodo izbirali tudi podpredsednike stranke, predsednika glavnega odbora ter člane izvršilnega in nadzornega odbora.
title_translated: Before SLS Congress Decision on Customer Leadership
description_translated: SLS members will decide on the leadership today at the Congress in Slovenska Bistrica, which will lead them to the next elections in the National Assembly. Tina Bregant and Nina Fear also run for the leadership of the party with current president Mark Balazic. Delegates will also be selected by the Vice -Presidents of the Party, the Chairman of the Chief Committee and the members of the Executive and Supervisory Board.

title: Bolni Luka Dončić poskusil nemogoče – trd boj vse do konca, toda ...
description: Minnesota je slavila svojo drugo zmago v seriji z Los Angeles Lakersi (116:104). Luka Dončić, ki je igral z očitnimi želodčnimi težavami, bo s soigralci poskušal serijo znova izenačiti že jutri. Tokrat je tekmo zaključil s 17 točkami, 8 asistencami in 6 skoki. Več na Ekipa.si
title_translated: Digal Luka Doncic tried impossible - hard fight all the way, but ...
description_translated: Minnesota celebrated her second victory in the series with Los Angeles Lakers (116: 104). Luka Doncic, who played with obvious stomach problems, will try to equalize the series tomorrow with his teammates. This time he finished the match with 17 points, 8 assists and 6 rebounds. More on team.si

title: Bo na čelu SLS-a ostal Marko Balažic? Izzivalki sta Tina Bregant in Nina Strah.
description: SLS danes čaka izredni volilni kongres, na katerem bo članstvo odločalo o vodstvu, ki jih bo popeljalo na naslednje volitve v DZ. Za vodenje stranke se bosta ob aktualnem predsedniku Marku Balažicu potegovali še Tina Bregant in Nina Strah.
title_translated: Will Marko Balazic stay at the head of the SLS? The challengers are Tina Bregant and Nina Fear.
description_translated: The SLS is awaiting an extraordinary election congress today, where membership will decide on the leadership, which will lead them to the next elections in the National Assembly. Tina Bregant and Nina Fear will be competing with the current president, Mark Balazic, with current President Mark Balazic.

title: Na stari dami nov dvoboj Pogačarja in Evenepoela, zadnja štiri leta edina na zmagovalnem odru v Liegeu
description: V nedeljo, 27. aprila, bodo vse oči ljubiteljev kolesarstva uprte v četrti spomenik sezone, slovito belgijsko klasiko Liege–Bastogne–Liege. Dirka, znana tudi kot La Doyenne ali stara dama, z 252 kilometri in kar 4.365 višinskimi metri velja za eno najzahtevnejših enodnevnih preizkušenj v koledarju. Na trasi z 11 kategoriziranimi vzponi bomo najverjetneje znova spremljali obračun dveh kolesarskih težkokategornikov, Tadeja Pogačarja in Remca Evenepoela. Vsak od njiju je v zadnjih štirih letih dvakrat zmagal na tej dirki: Pogačar v letih 2021 in 2024, Evenepoel pa v letih 2022 in 2023. Letošnja izvedba bo iz različnih razlogov njun prvi pravi neposredni dvoboj na stari dami. V preteklih letih so njuno srečanje preprečile poškodbe in smrt v družini.
title_translated: On the old lady a new duel of Pogacar and Evenepoel, the last four years on the winning stage in Liege
description_translated: On Sunday, April 27, all the eyes of cycling enthusiasts will be fixed into the fourth monument of the season, the famous Belgian classic Liege -Bastogne -Liega. The race, also known as La Dooyenne or the Old Lady, with 252 kilometers and 4,365 meters, is considered one of the most demanding one -day calendar trials. On the route with 11 categorized climbs, we will most likely be monitoring the showdown of two cycling heavyweights, Tadej Pogacar and Remca Evenepoel. Each of them has won this race twice in the last four years: Pogacar in 2021 and 2024, and Evenepoel in 2022 and 2023. Over the years, their meeting has prevented injuries and death in the family.

title: Očetov nasvet, ki se ga je držal vse življenje
description: Njegovo ime je med kandidati za papeža po vatikanskih hodnikih krožilo že leta 2005, ko se je po smrti Janeza Pavla II. tehtnica nato prevesila v prid Josepha Ratzingerja, ki je postal papež Benedikt XVI. Neizvolitve za poglavarja Katoliške cerkve si Jorge Bergoglio takrat ni jemal k srcu. Pravzaprav je Argentinec dejal, da je zadovoljen, ker se mu ne bo treba preseliti v Rim. Poudaril je, da si želi življenje preživeti v ljubljeni domovini. Takrat si ni predstavljal, da bo čez 20 let za njim žaloval ves svet.
title_translated: Father's advice he kept all his life
description_translated: His name was circulated among the candidates for the Pope in the Vatican corridors as early as 2005, when it was after the death of John Paul II. The scale then turned into favor of Joseph Ratzinger, who became Pope Benedict XVI. Jorge Bergoglio did not take his heart at the time. In fact, the Argentine said he was pleased that he would not have to move to Rome. He stressed that he wants to spend his life in his beloved homeland. At the time, he did not imagine that in 20 years, he would be mourning the whole world.

title: Redovnica, ki je ganila svet: ob krsti se je tiho poslovila od prijatelja
description: S svojo tiho molitvijo ob krsti papeža Frančiška, pri kateri je kljub pravilom vztrajala deset minut, prekinili pa je niso ne pripadniki švicarske garde ne policisti, je redovnica ganila svet. Sestra Geneviève je bila dolgoletna prijateljica papeža, spoznala sta se, ko je bil še kardinal. Takrat sta se najprej sprla, ko pa je postal papež se je med njima spletla tesna prijateljska vez. To je sestra Geneviève potrdila, ko so jo v Vatikanu ujele kamere.
title_translated: Nun that moved the world: she said goodbye to a friend at the baptism
description_translated: With his quiet prayer at the baptism of Pope Francis, in whom she persisted for ten minutes despite the rules, but not members of the Swiss Guard or police officers interrupted her, the nun moved the world. Sister Geneviève was a longtime friend of the Pope, and they met when he was a cardinal. At that time, they first quarreled, but when the pope became a close friendly bond between them. This was confirmed by Sister Geneviève when she was captured by cameras in the Vatican.

title: Zvezde, ki jih je ustvaril POP TV
description: POP TV letos praznuje 30 let in ob tem se z veseljem spominjamo vsega, kar smo v treh desetletjih ustvarili in doživeli. Veliko znanih slovenskih obrazov je takšnih, da jih poznamo že kar nekaj časa, za veliko njih pa se niti ne spomnimo, kje smo jih prvič videli. In kar nekaj takšnih je, ki so svojo kariero, takšno ali drugačno, začeli na POP TV.
title_translated: The stars created by POP TV
description_translated: POP TV is celebrating 30 years this year, and we are happy to remember everything we have created and experienced in three decades. Many famous Slovenian faces are such that we have known them for some time, and many of them do not even remember where we first saw them. And there are quite a few that started on Pop TV one way or another.

title: Top pet meme kovancev, za katere strokovnjaki napovedujejo, da bodo do leta 2030 ustvarili največ milijonarjev
description: Digitalni žetoni, ki so se začeli kot internetne šale, so zdaj resni igralci na trgu kriptovalut. Strokovnjaki napovedujejo, da bi nekateri izmed teh meme kovancev lahko ustvarili številne milijonarje pred letom 2030. Ta članek raziskuje pet obetavnih žetonov, ki bi v bližnji prihodnosti lahko prinesli izjemne donose.
title_translated: Top Five Memas of Coins, which experts predict to create a maximum of millionaires by 2030
description_translated: Digital tokens that have begun as internet jokes are now serious players in the cryptocurrency market. Experts predict that some of these coins could create many millionaires before 2030. This article explores five promising tokens that could bring exceptional returns in the near future.

title: 'Biografija pride, ko bo manj koncertov in več časa'
description: 67-letni Alen Islamović je zagotovo legenda ex-yu glasbene scene, saj je pel v zasedbah, kot sta Divlje jagode in Bijelo dugme. Ob njegovem nedavnem gostovanju v kranjskem Klubaru smo ga poprosili za kratek klepet o njegovi karieri in načrtih.
title_translated: 'Biography comes when there will be fewer concerts and more time'
description_translated: 67-year-old Alen Islamovic is definitely an ex-Yu music scene legend, as he sang in bands such as Divlje Strawberries and Bijelo Dugme. With his recent visit to the Carniola Club, we asked him for a short chat about his career and plans.

title: Tudi v Sloveniji dan žalovanja, zastave spuščene na pol droga
description: Vlada je sklenila, da ob smrti papeža Frančiška današnji dan razglasi dan žalovanja. Ob tem je organizatorjem dogodkov in različnih prireditev predlagala, naj od četrtka do sobote upoštevajo spomin na pokojnega papeža, na primer z minuto molka. Zastave na poslopjih državnih ustanov so tako danes spuščene na pol droga.
title_translated: Also in Slovenia the day of mourning, flags lowered on half a pole
description_translated: The government decided to announce the day of mourning today at the death of Pope Francis. At the same time, she suggested to organizers of events and various events to take into account the memory of the late Pope from Thursday to Saturday, for example with a minute's silence. Flags on state institutions buildings are thus lowered today.

title: Bled, potolčen, v mukah – a še vedno Luka: Nora trojka, ki je utišala dvorano (video)
description: Luka Dončić je na tretji tekmi serije z Minnesoto zaigral kljub želodčnim težavam in vseeno poskrbel za nekaj vrhuncev večera. Več na Ekipa.si
title_translated: Bled, shaky, in Muka - but still Luke: Crazy Troika that silenced the hall (video)
description_translated: Luka Doncic played in the third game of the Minnesota series despite his stomach problems and still provided some highlights of the evening. More on team.si

title: Umetni nohti za 9-letnico: Vplivnica upravičuje svoj stil starševstva
description: "Ne verjamem v prepovedi," pravi nemška vplivnica, ki svoji devetletni hčerki med drugim dovoli tudi umetne nohte.
title_translated: Artificial nails for 9th-year-old: Influence justifies his own style of parenting
description_translated: "I do not believe in the ban," says the German influence, who allows her nine -year -old daughter, among other things, artificial nails.

title: Polom Kraljev v zadnji tretjini, Edmonton znižal zaostanek
description: Hokejisti Edmontona so z izjemno zadnjo tretjino, v kateri so zadeli štirikrat, premagali Los Angeles s 7:4. S tem so znižali zaostanek v seriji na 2:1. Anže Kopitar je na svoji stoti tekmi v končnici prispeval dve podaji.
title_translated: King's pole in the last third, Edmonton lowered the backlog
description_translated: Edmonton hockey players beat Los Angeles 7: 4 with an extremely last third in which they scored four times. This reduced the gap in the 2-1 series. Anze Kopitar contributed two passes in his 100th game in the playoffs.

title: Luka Dončić bruhal ves dan, a vseeno stisnil zobe in igral za Lakers v končnici
description: Slovenski košarkar Luka Dončić se je na tretji tekmi prvega kroga končnice lige NBA proti Minnesoti Timberwolves spopadal z velikimi zdravstvenimi težavami. Kot je po porazu s 104:116 povedal trener Los Angeles Lakers JJ Redick, je bil Luka 24 ur pred tekmo v slabem stanju – ponoči naj skoraj ne bi spal, popoldne pred tekmo pa je večkrat bruhal.
title_translated: Luka Dončić vomited all day, but still clenched his teeth and played for Lakers in the playoffs
description_translated: Slovenian basketball player Luka Doncic confronted major health problems in the third game of the first round of the NBA against Minnesota Timberwolves. As Los Angeles Lakers coach JJ Redick said after a 104: 116 defeat, Luke was in poor condition 24 hours before the match - he would hardly sleep at night, and vomited several times before the match.

title: Papež, ki je uničevanje okolja razglasil za greh: Slišati moramo tudi jok Zemlje
description: Pokojni papež Frančišek je velik pečat pustil tudi s svojimi prizadevanji za okolje. Najbolj glasno je govoril z dejanji: živel je skromno, kuhal si je sam, uporabljal je javni prevoz in električni papa mobil. Kot je opozarjal, je uničevanje okolja greh. Človeštvo je posvaril pred škodljivimi posledicami lahkomiselnega ravnanja z našim planetom. Pred več kot 10 leti je papež Frančišek posvaril, da so podnebne spremembe velik neuspeh človeške morale.
title_translated: Pope, who declared environmental destruction as sin: we must hear the cry of the earth too
description_translated: The late Pope Francis also left a big mark with his efforts for the environment. He spoke loudly with actions: he lived modestly, cooked himself, used public transport and electric Papa Mobil. As he pointed out, the destruction of the environment is sin. Humanity warned against the harmful consequences of the frivolous treatment of our planet. More than 10 years ago, Pope Francis warned that climate change was a major failure of human morality.

title: Bo Jerez spet v znaku vročih bratov Marquez? Nekaj se bo vprašalo tudi Bagnaia
description: Sobota ponuja prvi vrhunec podaljšanega motociklističnega vikenda na VN Španije. V Jerez gre za peti dirkaški "izziv" sezone, na dosedanjih preizkušnjah je večji del slave pobral vroči Marc Marquez, ki je pospravil dvojno zmago na treh prizoriščih. Na petkovih prostih treningih je bil sicer najbolj viden njegov mlajši brat Alex z rekordom steze. Pred današnjo sprintersko dirko se bodo dirkači vseh razredih trudili v kvalifikacijah. Prenos Kanal A in VOYO.
title_translated: Will Jerez again be in the sign of the hot brothers Marquez? Something will also be asked by Bagnaia
description_translated: Saturday offers the first highlight of the extended motorcycle weekend at the GP of Spain. In Jerez, this is a fifth racing "challenge" of the season, in the trials so far, much of the glory was picked up by the hot Marc Marquez, who put off a double victory in three venues. On Friday's free training, his younger brother Alex with a track record was most visible. Before today's sprint race, racers of all classes will strive in qualifying. Transfer channel A and VOYO.

title: Kardinal Giovanni Battista Re: “Dragi papež Frančišek, zdaj pa mi prosimo tebe, da moliš za nas”
description: Giovanni Battista Re, dekan kardinalskega zbora: “Papež Frančišek je imel navado svoje govore in srečanja zaključiti z besedami: »Ne pozabite moliti zame!« Dragi papež Frančišek, zdaj pa mi prosimo tebe, da moliš za nas in da z nebes blagosloviš Cerkev, blagosloviš Rim, blagosloviš ves svet, kot si to storil prejšnjo nedeljo z balkona te bazilike [...]The post Kardinal Giovanni Battista Re: “Dragi papež Frančišek, zdaj pa mi prosimo tebe, da moliš za nas” appeared first on Demokracija.
title_translated: Cardinal Giovanni Battista Re: "Dear Pope Francis, but now we ask me to pray for us"
description_translated: Giovanni Battista Re, Dean of the Cardinal Choir: “Pope Francis had a habit of completing his speeches and meetings by saying,“ Remember to pray for me! ”Dear Pope Francis, but now we ask me to pray for us and bless the Church with heaven, bless Rome, bless the whole world, as you do last Sunday. Cardinal Giovanni Battista Re: “Dear Pope Francis, but now we ask you to pray for us” appeared first on democracy.

title: Zadnji del slovenske nadaljevanke Poklicani – nedelja ob 20.00 na TV SLO 1
description: Celotna ekipa je zbrana v sejni sobi, kjer s psihologinjo analizirajo dogodke preteklega tedna. Mia živčno pričakuje Ivono, ki bi morala priti iz Slovaške, a njena števila ostane nedosegljiva.
title_translated: The last part of the Slovenian sequel Called - Sunday at 8pm on TV SLO 1
description_translated: The whole team is gathered in a meeting room where they analyze the events of the past week with a psychologist. Mia is nervously expected by Ivona, which should come from Slovakia, but its numbers remain unattainable.

title: Na današnji dan (27. april) ...
title_translated: To today (April 27) ...

title: Lester Patrick – nepričakovani junak finalne tekme lige NHL, ki še danes drži rekord
description: V najmočnejši hokejski ligi na svetu se je pred dnevi začel najzabavnejši del sezone, končnica, v kateri poteka hud boj za Stanleyjev pokal. Tokratni Skok v športno preteklost smo zavrteli skoraj sto let nazaj, v april leta 1928, ko se je trener New York Rangers Lester Patrick v finalu lige NHL po sili razmer prelevil v vratarja, pomagal svojemu klubu do zmage, posledično pa tudi do naslova prvaka. Pokojni odlični branilec in trener, po katerem se imenujejo tudi hokejske nagrade, je s 44 leti in 99 dnevi še danes rekorder – najstarejši hokejist, ki je zaigral v velikem finalu NHL.
title_translated: Lester Patrick - Unexpected Hero of the NHL League Final, which still holds the record
description_translated: In the most powerful hockey league in the world, the most prominent part of the season began days ago, the playoffs in which a fierce fight for the Stanley Cup takes place. This year's jump into the sporting past was turned almost a hundred years ago, in April 1928, when New York Rangers coach Lester Patrick in the NHL Finals after an emergency situation was transformed into a goalkeeper, helping his club to victory and, consequently, to the champion title. The late excellent defender and coach, which is also called hockey awards, is still a record holder with 44 years and 99 days - the oldest hockey player who played in the NHL grand final.

title: Dnevni horoskop: device se odpravite na zmenek, biki nehajte odlašati
description: Dnevni horoskop za 27. april. Preverite, kaj vam piše v zvezdah.
title_translated: Daily horoscope: Give the virgins to date, stop the bull
description_translated: Daily horoscope for 27. April. Check what is written in the stars.

title: Iz dolgov s stilom: Finančni strokovnjak razkriva trike!
description: Življenje v dolgovih je postala realnost za mnoge. Strokovnjak deli ključne trike za finančno preobrazbo. Bodite pozorni na kreditne kartice, socialna omrežja in 'kupi zdaj, plačaj pozneje' sheme. Spoznajte trike za uspešen izhod iz dolgov in kako povrniti nadzor nad financami.
title_translated: From Debt with Style: A financial expert reveals tricks!
description_translated: Life in debt has become a reality for many. An expert shares key tricks for financial transformation. Pay attention to credit cards, social networks and 'buy now, pay later' scheme. Get to know the tricks for a successful debt exit and how to restore control of finances.

title: Kriza v gostinstvu: Zakaj luksuzne restavracije znižujejo cene?
description: V Nemčiji se elitne restavracije odzivajo na zmanjševanje števila gostov z zniževanjem cen obrokov, kar je posledica dejavnikov, kot so povišanje DDV in višje cene hrane. Restavracije kot Kink in Swanson spreminjajo svoje strategije, da bi privabile goste in ohranile poslovanje v zahtevnih razmerah.
title_translated: Catering crisis: Why do luxury restaurants lower prices?
description_translated: In Germany, elite restaurants respond to reducing the number of guests by reducing meal prices, which is due to factors such as VAT increase and higher food prices. Restaurants as Kink and Swanson are changing their strategies to attract guests and maintain business in challenging conditions.

title: Zdravnica se sramuje plače, ki jo prejema za svoje delo
description: Zdravnica iz Nemčije, ki ima lastno ordinacijo in obsežno bazo pacientov, razkriva svojo plačo. Kljub visokim prihodkom, jo je sram lastnega zaslužka. Zakaj?
title_translated: The doctor is ashamed of the salary he receives for his work
description_translated: A German doctor, who has his own office and extensive patient base, reveals her salary. Despite high revenue, she is ashamed of her own earnings. Why?

title: Barceloni španski pokal - Real se je vrnil med žive, a doživel hud udarec (video)
description: Srhljivka v Andaluziji. Več na Ekipa.si
title_translated: Barceloni Spanish Cup - Real Returned to Live but experienced a severe blow (video)
description_translated: Hello in Andalusia. More on team.si

title: Drama v Sevilli: Barcelona v podaljšku strla Real in osvojila pokal
description: Nogometaši Barcelone in madridskega Reala so v finalu kraljevega pokala poskrbeli za pravo poslastico. Po napeti in dramatični tekmi v Sevilli so slavili Katalonci, ki so po podaljšku premagali večne tekmece s 3:2. Junak Barcelone je postal branilec Jules Kounde.
title_translated: Drama in Seville: Barcelona in overtime Strel Real and won the trophy
description_translated: Barcelona and Madrid Real Madrid football players made a real treat in the Royal Cup final. After a tense and dramatic match in Seville, the Catalans celebrated, beating eternal rivals by 3: 2 after the extra time. Barcelona's hero became defender Jules Kounde.

title: Barbara Lenart: S preprostimi stvarmi si lahko spremenimo življenje (Suzy)
description: Spoznala sem jo, ko je pod imenom Pureayur k nam pripeljala linijo rastlinskih pripravkov podjetja Anima Mundi, ki ga je zasnovala šamanka in herbalistka Adriana Ayales. Ob mladostnih težavah z motnjami hranjenja je odkrila jogo in ajurvedo in se izobraževala na obeh področjih.
title_translated: Barbara Lenart: With simple things we can change our lives (Suzy)
description_translated: I met her when, under the name Pureyur, she brought us a line of herbal preparations for Anima Mundi, designed by shaman and herbalist Adriana Ayales. With youthful eating disorders, she discovered yoga and Ayurveda and educated herself in both fields.

title: Cedeviti Olimpiji preobrat ni uspel, Krka nemočna proti Zvezdi
description: V 29., predzadnjem krogu rednega dela lige ABA je Cedevita Olimpija v Stožicah izgubila s Partizanom z 71:81. Ljubljančani so po prvem polčasu zaostajali za 12 točk, se v drugem ves čas približevali nasprotniku, a jim preobrat ni uspel. Krka je gostovala v Beogradu pri Crveni zvezdi in izgubila z 69:81. Po porazu Cibone proti Borcu so si košarkarji iz Novega mesta sicer že priborili končno 14. mesto in s tem obstanek v ligi.

description_translated: About 276,000 schoolchildren are officially on May Day holidays, where they enjoy nine days this year. They will be able to enrich their holiday days with a variety of activities. Better weather is also expected. In the school benches, however, schoolchildren will return on Monday, May 5.

title: Luka Dončić in Lakers zapravili zmago in so pred bolečim izpadom #video
description: Los Angeles Lakers so v prvem krogu končnice lige NBA pred izpadom. Na četrti tekmi so jih Minnesota Timberwolves premagali s 116:113 in v seriji na štiri zmage povedli s 3:1. Luka Dončić se je po zdravstvenih težavah v petek naspal in počutil bolje. Prvo četrtino so Lakers dobili z 32:28, ob polčasu zaostajali z 58:61. Drugi polčas so odprli z delnim izidom 14:0 in v zadnjo četrtino vstopili s prednostjo 94:84, a je nato napeta zadnja četrtina pripadla Minnesoti, ki jo je dobila z 32:19. Dončić je dal 38 točk, a imel le en skok in dve asistenci. LeBron James je tekmo končal s 27 točkami, Rui Hachimura s 23, Austin Reaves pa s 17. Pri Minnesoti je blestel Anthony Edwards – s 43 točkami, devetimi skoki in šestimi asistencami. Poleg Minnesote so v seriji s 3:1 povedli tudi Boston, New York in Indiana.
title_translated: Luka Dončić and Lakers wasted a victory and were before the painful outburst
description_translated: Los Angeles Lakers are in the first round of the NBA endings before the downtime. In the fourth game, Minnesota Timberwolves beat them 116: 113 and led with 3: 1 in four wins. Luka Doncic slept after Friday and felt better. The first quarter was won by Lakers with 32:28, at halftime behind with 58:61. The second half was opened with a partial score of 14: 0 and entered the last quarter with a priority of 94:84, but then the last quarter belonged to Minnesota, which it won with 32:19. Doncic scored 38 points, but had only one jump and two assists. Lebron James finished 27 points, Rui Hachimura S 23, and Austin Reaves with 17. Anthony Edwards shone at Minnesota - with 43 points, nine jumps and six assistance. In addition to Minnesota, Boston, New York and Indiana led in the 3-1 series.

title: Priznani zobozdravnik podarja celostno diagnostiko v vrednosti 1.000 evrov
description: Izguba zob močno vpliva na kakovost življenja, samozavest, govor in prehranjevanje. A sodobna dentalna medicina na srečo ponuja napredne rešitve za povrnitev nasmeha. Ena izmed najbolj prebojnih in zanesljivih metod je All-on-4, napredna implantološka metoda, ki ne le rešuje funkcionalne in estetske izzive, temveč spreminja življenja ljudi.
title_translated: A renowned dentist gives comprehensive diagnostics worth $ 1,000
description_translated: Teeth loss has a profound effect on quality of life, self -esteem, speech and nutrition. But modern dental medicine is fortunately offering advanced solutions to restore a smile. One of the most breakthrough and reliable methods is the All-on-4, an advanced implant method that not only solves functional and aesthetic challenges, but changes people's lives.

title: Zelenski obtožil Moskvo namernega zavajanja v pogovorih
description: Ukrajinski predsednik je Rusijo obtožil namernega zavajanja v pogovorih glede morebitnega končanja vojne v Ukrajini. "Rusi veliko govorijo o svoji domnevni pripravljenosti sprejeti ameriške predloge, vendar doslej ni bilo nobenih priprav ruske vojske na dejanski molk (orožja op.p.)," je dejal Zelenski v večernem video nagovoru.
title_translated: Green accusing Moscow intentional misleading in conversations
description_translated: The Ukrainian president has accused Russia intentionally in talks on the possible ending of the war in Ukraine. "The Russians talk a lot about their alleged willingness to accept US proposals, but so far there have been no preparation for the Russian army for actual silence (weapons op.p.)," said the green in the evening video.

title: Zakulisje turistične Madeire: melanholični otok z okusom po morju in rumu
description: Madeiro bi bilo zelo lahko odpraviti kot še eno turistično destinacijo več, a ta osupljivi otok je, ko ga spoznate pobližje, precej zanimivejši, kot se zdi.
title_translated: Behind the Tourist Madeira: Melancholy Island with Sea and Rum
description_translated: It would be very easy to eliminate Madeiro as another tourist destination, but when you get to know it, this stunning island is much more interesting than it seems.

title: "Arhitektura je vedno tudi orodje ljudi, ki imajo moč in odrejajo, kako naj družba živi"
description: "V vsaki arhitekturi je vedno tak ali drugačen nadzor nad družbo. Lahko spodbuja egalitarnost, lahko pa ustvarja matrico čim popolnejšega ekonomskega ali političnega nadzora. To je nenehno prekletstvo arhitekture," pove arhitekt Miloš Kosec.
title_translated: "Architecture is always a tool of people who have power and order how to live society"
description_translated: "In any architecture, there is always one way or another control over society. It can promote egalitarianism, but it can create a matrix as complete economic or political control as possible. This is a constant curse of architecture," says architect Miloš Kosec.

title: Zendaya in Tom Holland prvič po novici o zaroki skupaj ujeta v objektive
description: Hollywoodska zvezdnica Zendaya se mudi na setu tretje sezone serije Evforija, kjer pa ni sama. Družbo ji namreč delata zaročenec Tom Holland in psiček Noon. Mlada zaljubljenca, ki skrbno skrivata svojo zasebnost, in njunega štirinožnega prijatelja so v objektiv ujeli fotografi.

description_translated: Hollywood star Zendaya is in a hurry at the set of the third season of the euphoria series, where she is not alone. Namely, her fiancé Tom Holland and puppy Noon are doing the company. A young lovers who carefully hide their privacy and their four -legged friend captured photographers in the lens.

title: 'Če bi se določene zadeve odvile drugače, bi imeli dve zmagi več'
description: 38 točk Luke Dončića in dvojni dvojček LeBrona Jamesa je bilo premalo, da bi se Los Angeles Lakersi v prvem krogu končnice v zmagah poravnali z nasprotniki. Minnesota Timberwolvesi so v izdihljajih četrte tekme prišli do zmage s 116:113, jezerniki pa verjamejo, da so možnosti za napredovanje še zmeraj povsem realne.
title_translated: 'If certain matters were different, we would have two wins more'

Minnesota Timberwolves came to wins 116: 113 in the fourth game exhalations, and the lakes believe that the chances of advancement are still quite realistic.

title: Ko te ujame lakota: preizkusili smo Perfect metuljčke s špinačo, rikoto in piščancem
description: Pomlad je tu – z vsemi klasičnimi aprilsko-majskimi muhami. Malo sonca, malo vetra, tu in tam dež, a kljub vsemu nas vleče ven. Kdor ima vrt, balkon ali le nekaj lončnic, dobro ve, kako hitro te zagrabi pomladna evforija. Ure ob prekopavanju, sajenju, čiščenju in obrezovanju minejo, kot bi trenil. Dokler te ne predrami lakota – tista konkretna, ko ugotoviš, da je ura že skoraj tri in nisi pojedel še ničesar.
title_translated: When you are caught by hunger: we have tried perfect butterflies with spinach, ricotta and chicken
description_translated: Spring is here-with all the classic April-Maja flies. A little sun, a little wind, it rain here and there, but it nevertheless pulls us out. Anyone who has a garden, a balcony, or just a few pots knows how quickly the spring euphoria grabs you. Hours over digging, planting, cleaning and pruning passes as if they were training. Until you are hungry - the one is concrete when you find that the clock is almost three and you didn't eat anything yet.

Med novostmi sta tudi mobilno oz. digitalno vozniško dovoljenje, začasni odvzem vozniškega dovoljenja zaradi kršitve bo veljal po vsej Evropski uniji, predlog je tudi obvezen zdravstveni pregled, vključno s pregledom vida in ožilja. A digital driving license, a temporary withdrawal of a driver's license for a violation will be valid throughout the European Union, and a proposal is also a mandatory medical examination, including vision and vascular inspection. We searched for different expert opinions.

description: Pri nas morajo nekateri starši otrok z Downovim sindromom periodično dokazovati, da si zaslužijo dodatek za posebno nego. Na ministrstvu smo povprašali, zakaj takšna ureditev.

title: Najprej kresovi in mlaji, nato budnice in pohodi
description: Ob prazniku dela po Sloveniji zagorijo številni kresovi, v več krajih v čast delavstvu organizirajo tudi budnice, postavijo mlaje in priredijo prvomajske pohode. Sindikati med drugim vabijo na tradicionalno kresovanje na ljubljanskem Rožniku. Letos je v ospredju sporočilo delavske solidarnosti, povezanosti, enakopravnosti in spoštovanja.
title_translated: First bonfires and younger, then vigils and hikes
description_translated: During the work of work around Slovenia, many bonfires are burned, in several places in honor of the work, they also organize vigils, set up young people and organize May Day hikes. Unions invite, among other things, to traditional bonfire on the Ljubljana Rožnik. This year, the message of workers' solidarity, connection, equality and respect is at the forefront.

title: E-cigarete med mladimi: možgani se razvijajo do 24. leta in vsaka zasvojenost povzroči težave
description: Po zadnji raziskavi Nacionalnega inštituta za javno zdravje kar vsak tretji dijak v Sloveniji uporablja sodobne nikotinske izdelke, kot so elektronske cigarete.
title_translated: E-cigarettes among young people: the brain develops up to 24 years and any addiction causes problems
description_translated: According to the latest survey of the National Institute of Public Health, every third student in Slovenia uses modern nicotine products such as electronic cigarettes.

title: Še danes se lahko prijavite za glasovanje po pošti
description: Pred zakonodajnim referendumom o dodatku k pokojnini za izjemne umetniške dosežke, ki bo 11. maja, se je še danes mogoče prijaviti za glasovanje po pošti iz Slovenije. Na tak način lahko glasujejo oskrbovanci domov za starejše, volivci, ki so v bolnišnicah ali v zaporu, ter invalidi.
title_translated: You can still apply for voting by mail today
description_translated: Prior to the legislative referendum on the supplement to the pension for outstanding artistic achievements, which will be held on May 11, it is still possible to apply for voting by mail from Slovenia. In this way, the caregivers can vote home for the elderly, voters who are in hospitals or in prison, and people with disabilities.

title: Predreferendumska vročica: škodljiv zakon ali zloraba kulture?
description: Glasovanje ali bojkot: bo zaradi rezultata referenduma v zadregi vlada? Bo podatek o udeležbi na referendumu povzročil skrbi desnici? Bo dodatek k pokojnini za izjemne dosežke še naprej izplačan po starem zakonu ali po novem? Veliko vprašanj, vsaj nekaj je gotovega – SDS je uspelo zbrati več kot 47 tisoč podpisov podpore za razpis referenduma, kmalu bo na sporedu. 11. maja. In o čem konkretno boste odločali?
title_translated: Pre -referendum fever: harmful law or abuse of culture?
description_translated: Voting or Boycott: Will it be embarrassed by the referendum? Will participation information in the referendum cause the right handcours? Will the pension allowance for outstanding achievements continue to be paid under the old law or new? A lot of questions, at least something is certain - the SDS managed to collect more than 47,000 signatures of support for the referendum, and it will soon be scheduled. 11 May. And what are you specifically deciding?

title: Trumpovih prvih sto dni: na borzi največji upad v več kot 50 letih
description: Trumpove carine so že precej prizadele svetovne trgovinske tokove. Pod drobnogledom je ladijski tovor. Svetovalno podjetje Drewry pričakuje, da bo obseg ladijskega pretovora po vsem svetu zaradi ameriške trgovinske politike letos padel za 1 %.
title_translated: Trump's first hundred days: on the stock exchange the biggest decline in more than 50 years
description_translated: Trump's customs have already been quite affected by the world trade flows. There is a shipping load under scrutiny. Drewry expects that the volume of shipping worldwide worldwide will fall by 1 %this year due to US trade policy.

title: Hrvaški evrovizijski predstavnik: Klemen Slakonja bo nedvomno osvojil srca ljudi
description: Marko Bošnjak, letošnji hrvaški evrovizijski predstavnik, je s Klemenom Slakonjo, ki bo zastopal Slovenijo, že pred Evrovizijo spletel prijateljsko vez. Navdušila ga je tudi njegova skladba. "Klemen bo zagotovo osvojil srca ljudi," je Bošnjak dejal v pogovoru pred odhodom v Švico. Kako odgovarja kritikom, kaj poreče na stavnice, ki mu trenutno ne napovedujejo vstopa v finale, in s čim bo navdušil v Baslu?
title_translated: Croatian Eurovision representative: Klemen Slakonja will undoubtedly win the hearts of people
description_translated: Marko Bošnjak, this year's Croatian Eurovision representative, made a friendly bond with Klemen Slakonja, who will represent Slovenia, before Eurovision. He was also impressed by his song. "Klemen will surely win the hearts of people," Bosniak said in a conversation before going to Switzerland. How does he respond to critics, what does he say to the bookmakers who are not announcing his entry into the finals at the moment, and what will he impress in Basel?

title: Washington prvič po osvojenem Stanleyjevem pokalu dobil serijo končnice
description: Hokejisti Washingtona in Floride so v Ligi NHL napredovali v drugi krog končnice. Capitalsi so izločili Montreal, Panterji pa so bili boljši od floridskega tekmeca Tampa Baya. Obe seriji sta se končali s 4:1 v zmagah.
title_translated: Washington for the first time since Stanley Cup won
description_translated: Washington and Florida hockey players progressed to the second round of the playoffs in the NHL. The Capitals eliminated Montreal, and the panners were better than the Florida rival Tampa Bay. Both series ended with 4: 1 in victories.

title: Florida in Washington v drugem krogu
description: Hokejisti Washington Capitals so v ligi NHL s 4:1 na svojem ledu premagali Montreal Canadiens in se s 4:1 v zmagah uvrstili v drugi krog. Prav tako s 4:1 so zmagali tudi igralci Floride Panthers, ki so Tampo Bay Lightning ugnali s 6:3. V tretji tekmi večera so Winnipeg Jets s 5:3 premagali ekipo St. Louis Blues in povedli s 3:2 v zmagah. Igralci Los Angeles Kings slovenskega kapetana Anžeta Kopitarja bodo v noči na petek igrali v Edmontonu proti Oilers, ki vodijo s 3:2 v zmagah.
title_translated: Florida and Washington in the second round
description_translated: Washington Capitals hockey players beat Montreal Canadiens in the NHL 4-1 on their ice and qualified for the second round with 4: 1. Also 4-1 were also won by Florida Panthers, who chased Bay Lightning with 6: 3. In the third game of the evening, Winnipeg Jets beat St. Louis blues and led with 3: 2 in victories. Los Angeles Kings players of Slovenian captain Anže Kopitar will play in Edmonton against Oilers on Friday nights, leading 3-2 in victories.

title: ZDA in Ukrajina podpisali težkopričakovani sporazum o redkih zemljah
description: ZDA in Ukrajina sta v sredo zvečer sklenili sporazum o redkih zemljah, poroča francoska tiskovna agencija AFP, ki se sklicuje na ministra za finance ZDA Scotta Bessenta. Ta je izjavil, da sporazum potrjuje zavezo obeh držav za trajni mir in blaginjo Ukrajine.
title_translated: US and Ukraine signed a hard -to -apply agreement on rare lands
description_translated: The US and Ukraine concluded an agreement on rare land on Wednesday night, according to French news agency AFP, which refers to US Minister Scott Bessent. The latter stated that the agreement confirms the commitment of both countries for permanent peace and the well -being of Ukraine.

title: Španski režiser kritičen do Donalda Trumpa: Bil sem v dvomih, ali naj pridem v ZDA
description: Pedro Almodovar ni bil prepričan, ali naj odpotuje v ZDA in prevzame nagrado. Razlog? Domnevno nspoštovanje človekovih pravic s strani ameriškega predsednika Donalda Trumpa. Njegovo vladanje je primerjal z odraščanjem v Španiji v času vladanja Francisca Franca.
title_translated: Spanish director critical of Donald Trump: I was in doubt if I should come to the US
description_translated: Pedro Almodovar was not sure if he should travel to the United States and receive the prize. Reason? Alleged human rights by US President Donald Trump. He compared his rule to growing up in Spain during the reign of Francisco Franco.

title: Zaljubljeni detel med paritveno sezono razbija ogledala
description: Če so pred dobrimi 200 leti v ameriški ribiški vasici v britanske vojake metali kamenje s pomočjo frač iz hlačnih nogavic, domačini Rockporta zdaj po zraku opletajo z vrečami in brisačami. Vse zato, da bi pregnali zagretega vaškega vandala. Zaljubljeni detel se je namreč odločil, da bo med iskanjem ptičje srčne izbranke obračunal prav z vsemi tekmeci in glede na povzročeno škodo jih je uzrl vsaj 25, če preštejemo samo razbita stranska ogledala. Ljubezen v zraku - dobesedno!
title_translated: In love with a clover during a mating season breaks the mirror
description_translated: If, over 200 years ago, in a US fishing village, rocks were thrown in British soldiers with the help of pantyhose fits, Rockport locals are now lining with bags and towels. All in order to drive away the heated village vandal. In love, he decided to account for all competitors while finding a bird's heart, and at least 25 of them, if we count only the broken side mirrors,. Love in the air - literally!

title: Nova pravila EU za voznike: ostrejši ukrepi za pol manj smrti
description: EU spreminja pravila za voznike in dovoljenja. Predlog prinaša digitalna vozniška dovoljenja, preizkusno dobo za začetnike ter odvzem dovoljenja za hujše prekrške, kot sta visoka hitrost in vožnja pod vplivom alkohola po celotni EU. Cilj je 50-odstotno zmanjšanje smrti v prometu.
title_translated: New EU rules for drivers: sharper measures for half less death
description_translated: The EU amends the rules for drivers and permits. The proposal brings about digital driving licenses, a trial period for beginners, and withdrawal of serious offenses, such as high speed and driving under the influence of alcohol throughout the EU. The goal is a 50 % reduction in death deaths.

title: Washington in Florida v drugem krogu končnice NHL
description: Hokejisti Washington Capitals so v severnoameriški ligi NHL s 4:1 na svojem ledu premagali Montreal Canadiens in se s 4:1 v zmagah uvrstili v drugi krog. Prav tako s 4:1 so zmagali tudi igralci Floride Panthers, ki so Tampo Bay Lightning ugnali s 6:3.
title_translated: Washington and Florida in the second round of NHL playoffs
description_translated: Washington Capitals hockey players beat Montreal Canadiens in the North American NHL 4-1 on their ice and qualified for the second round with 4: 1. Also 4-1 were also won by Florida Panthers, who chased Bay Lightning with 6: 3.

title: Boleč konec sanj za Luko Dončića in Los Angeles Lakers
description: Konec je. Luka Dončić in Los Angeles Lakers so s porazom na peti tekmi prvega kroga končnice lige NBA proti Minnesoti Timberwolves, ki je serijo dobila s 4:1 v zmagah, sklenili sezono. Minnesota je na zadnji tekmi v Crypto.com Areni po vnovič strelsko porazni zadnji četrtini Lakersov zmagala s 103:96. Luka Dončić je na svojem zadnjem srečanju v sezoni dosegel 28 točk, sedem skokov in devet asistenc, na koncu pa s sklonjeno glavo in z bolečinami v hrbtu zapustil parket. Med živimi pa ostajajo Houston Rockets, ki so proti Golden State Warriors ohranili upanje in zaostanek v zmagah znižali na 2:3, potem ko so na domačem parketu slavili s 131:116.
title_translated: Painful end of dreams for Luka Doncic and Los Angeles Lakers
description_translated: It's over. Luka Doncic and Los Angeles Lakers, with a defeat in the fifth game of the first round of the NBA against Minnesota Timberwolves, who won the series 4-1 in victories, made the season. Minnesota won 103: 96 in the last match at Crypto.com Arena after a shot -shot. At his last meeting of the season, Luka Doncic scored 28 points, seven rebounds and nine assists, and finally with his head and left his back pain. Among the living, however, are Houston Rockets, who retained hope against the Golden State Warriors and reduced the gap to 2: 3 after celebrating 131: 116 on the home floor.
