title: Slovenija na lestvici svobode medijev pridobila devet mest
description: Slovenija se je na lestvici svobode medijev mednarodne organizacije Novinarji brez meja uvrstila na 33. mesto, kar je devet mest višje kot lani. Med 27 državami EU pa je šele na 18. mestu, torej v spodnji polovici. Slovenija je na lestvici pridobila zlasti zaradi napredka pri političnem in pri družbenem kazalniku, so navedli v organizaciji. Kot so zapisali, zdajšnja vlada sorazmerno spoštuje medijsko svobodo. Politične pritiske tako bolj izvajajo opozicijske stranke, ki medijem nasprotujejo in jim želijo vzeti verodostojnost.
title_translated: Slovenia gained nine places at the media freedom rankings
description_translated: In the freedom of the media, Slovenia ranked 33 in the freedom of the International Organization of the International Organization without Borders, which is nine places higher than last year. Among the 27 EU countries, however, it is only 18. Slovenia has acquired in the rankings in particular due to progress in political and social indicator, the organization said. As they wrote, the current government relatively respects media freedom. Political pressure is thus more carried out by opposition parties that oppose the media and want to take credibility.

description: Mladi slovenski nogometaš Erik Kojzek je imenitno sezono 2024/25, v kateri je v dresu Wolfsbergerja dosegel kar deset zadetkov, kronal s prvo lovoriko v članski karieri. 19-letni Korošec je pomagal svojemu klubu do pokalne lovorike. Wolfsberger je v finalu v Celovcu z 1:0 ugnal Hartberg in prvič v zgodovini kluba postal pokalni zmagovalec, koroški najstnik pa je odigral 29 minut. Kojzek si je s tem zagotovil tudi evropsko vozovnico.

Wolfsberger scored Hartberg in the final in Klagenfurt 1-0 and became a cup winner for the first time in the club's history, and the Carinthian teenager played 29 minutes. Kojzek also secured a European ticket.

Na enem od treningov v Pirenejih, kjer je opravljal ogled letošnje trase, se mu je nepričakovano pridružil 19-letni francoski amaterski kolesar Paul Capelle, ki je zaradi nepozabne izkušnje celo spremenil svojo navijaško naklonjenost. At one of the training in Pyrenees, where he was watching this year's route, he was unexpectedly joined by 19-year-old French amateur cyclist Paul Capelle, who even changed his cheerleading affection due to an unforgettable experience. He used to be a fan of Pogacar, and now he cheered for Vingegaard.

title: Kdaj bo konec vojne?

Toda zgolj kratko premirje še zdaleč ni tisto, kar po več kot treh letih invazije zahteva Ukrajina, ki je že marca brez težav pristala na ameriški mirovni predlog. Napoved predsednika Donalda Trumpa, da bo vojno končal v enem dnevu, se tako ob ruskem zavlačevanju vse bolj spreminja v vprašanje, kdaj in če bo vojna sploh končana. Iz Washingtona, ki sicer pod Trumpom precej popušča Rusiji, v zadnjem času prihajajo opozorila, da bo Amerika dvignila roke in se umaknila z mirovnih pogajanj, če ne bo napredka. A predsednik Trump pravi, da za zdaj še ni obupal.
title_translated: When will the end of the war be over?
description_translated: When celebrating and parade on the day of victory in the Second World War, they are expected to stop attacks on Ukraine in Moscow for three days. But just a short truce is far from what, after more than three years of invasion, it requires Ukraine, which easily agreed to the US peace proposal in March. President Donald Trump's announcement that he will end the war in one day, and in the face of Russian delay, he is increasingly changing into the question of when and if the war is over. From Washington, who is quite loosening to Russia under Trump, warnings have recently come that America will raise her hands and withdraw from peace negotiations if there is no progress. But President Trump says he has not despaired yet.

title: Koliko bo morala Slovenija nameniti za obrambo?

Vse glasnejši so pozivi, da bi morale države nameniti tri odstotke in več. Bo Slovenija lahko izigrala Natov diktat, kot poziva koalicijska Levica? Vlada se zavzema za t. i. opremo za dvojno rabo. O tem smo se pogovarjali z evropskima poslancema Matejem Toninom in Vladimirjem Prebiličem.
title_translated: How much will Slovenia have to devote to defense?
description_translated: The required two percent of GDP, which are expected to devote to NATO Member States for military expenditures, seem to be the past. There are increasing calls for countries to devote three percent and more. Will Slovenia be able to play our dictate as a coalition left? The government is committed to t. i. Dual use equipment. We talked about this with MEPs Mate Tonin and Vladimir Prebilić.

Napad v Kašmirju pred dvema tednoma in indijska 'protiteroristična operacija Sindoor' pa sta državi pahnila na rob nove vojne, tokrat že četrte.

The Kashmir attack two weeks ago and the Indian 'Sindoor anti -terrorist operation', however, plunged the countries to the edge of a new war, this time for the fourth.

The Kolektor government builds a second track of the railway against Koper, and Petrič also provides a proper reporting of the newspaper. He was Stojan Petrič at the regime celebration in Stožice Appeared First on Democracy.

title: Na vidiku nova velika omejitev plastičnih izdelkov
description: V prihodnjem obdobju se obetajo nove prepovedi na področju plastične embalaže.
title_translated: In the sight of a new large limit of plastic products
description_translated: In the coming period, new bans in the field of plastic packaging are expected.

title: Krvava pomlad 1945
description: Piše: Andrej Sekulović Kdor je obiskal množična grobišča v Kočevskem rogu v času, ko tam ni spominskih slovesnosti, je lahko videl, da na tem kraju skorajda ni slišati petja ptic in drugih zvokov gozda. Območje je zavito v temačno tišino, zrak se zdi težji. Iz globočin preteklosti odmevajo le krvoločni streli in topi udarci padajočih [...]The post Krvava pomlad 1945 appeared first on Demokracija.
title_translated: Bloody spring 1945
description_translated: It writes: Andrej Sekulovic Anyone who visited the mass graves in Kočevski Rog at a time when there was no commemorative ceremony there could see that there was almost no hearing of birds and other sounds of the forest in this place. The area is wrapped in dark silence, the air seems heavier. From the depths of the past, only bloodthirsty shots and blunt blows of falling [...] The post bloody spring 1945 Appeared First on Democracy.

title: Podaljševalnik dosega kot hibridna nadgradnja
description: Rešitev, na katero prisega Kitajska in bo morda zanimiva tudi za Evropo.
title_translated: The extension is reached as a hybrid upgrade
description_translated: A solution to which China swears and may be of interest to Europe as well.

title: Prihodnost Dončića v Los Angelesu: zagotovo, najbrž, morda ne?
description: Luka Dončić poleti odloča o prihodnosti z Los Angeles Lakers. Na mizi ima štiri zelo donosne možnosti za novo pogodbo, prihodnje poletje je lahko prost igralec.
title_translated: Doncic's future in Los Angeles: Surely, probably, maybe not?
description_translated: Luka Dončić decides the future with Los Angeles Lakers in the summer. There are four very lucrative options on the table, and he can be a free player next summer.

title: Strašljive prerokbe Babe Vange: To nas čaka od letos dalje
description: Čeprav je od njene smrti minilo že skoraj trideset let, Baba Vanga še vedno buri duhove. Mnogi trdijo, da je z neverjetno natančnostjo napovedala teroristični napad na New York 11. septembra, izstop Združenega kraljestva iz Evropske unije, smrt kraljice Elizabete in številne naravne nesreče. Kaj pa je napovedala za leto 2025?
title_translated: Baba Vange scary prophecies: That's waiting for us from this year
description_translated: Although almost thirty years have passed since her death, Baba Vanga still stirs ghosts. Many claim that with incredible precision, it announced a terrorist attack on New York 11. September, UK's exit from the European Union, the death of Queen Elizabeth and many natural disasters. What did she predict for 2025?

title: Indiana na pragu konferenčnega finala
description: V izjemni tretji četrtini, ki so jo dobili z 42:16, so košarkarji Indiane dosegli tretjo zmago proti Clevelandu. Oklahoma izenačila proti Denverju.
title_translated: Indiana on the threshold of conference finals
description_translated: In the extraordinary third quarter they won with 42:16, Indiana basketball players achieved their third victory against Cleveland. Oklahoma equalized towards Denver.

title: Več kot dva tisoč obiskovalcev na slovenskem veleposlaništvu v ZDA
description: Poslopje slovenskega veleposlaništva v ameriški prestolnici Washington je v soboto ob tradicionalni prireditvi dneva odprtih vrat EU obiskalo več kot dva tisoč ljudi. Ti so lahko okusili potico, kranjsko klobaso, koroško skuto in slovensko čokolado. Na voljo so bila tudi vina Kleti Brda in Rodica.
title_translated: More than two thousand visitors at the US Embassy in the US
description_translated: The building of the Slovenian Embassy in the US capital Washington was visited by more than two thousand people on Saturday, with the traditional EU Open Day event. They were able to taste potica, Carniolan sausage, Carinthian curd and Slovenian chocolate. The wines of Brda and Rodica were also available.

title: Demi Moore ni pozabila na psička: nadela mu je ujemajočo se ovratnico
description: Čeprav psička Demi Moore ni bilo ob igralki na rdeči preprogi Met Gale, pa to ne pomeni, da je igralka pozabila nanj. Modni oblikovalec Brad Goreski je za Pilaf namreč ustvaril ovratnico, ujemajočo se z igralkino obleko.
title_translated: Demi Moore didn't forget the puppy: she put on a matching collar
description_translated: Although the puppy Demi Moore was not with the actress on the red carpet, Met Gale, that doesn't mean the actress forgot about her. Fashion designer Brad Goreski has created a collar for Pilaf, matching the actress's dress.

title: Ste vedeli? Temu je pravzaprav namenjena ročica pod vzvratnim ogledalom
description: Vzvratno ogledalo je pomemben element varnost iv vozilu, brez katerega si ne predstavljamo nobenega vozila. Toda ponoči lahko žarometi drugih avtomobilov zaslepijo voznika. Zato ima vzvratno ogledalo dodaten vzvod na spodnjem robu.
title_translated: Did you know? This is actually intended for the lever under the rearview mirror
description_translated: The rearview mirror is an important element of safety IV to a vehicle without which we do not imagine any vehicle. But at night, other car headlamps can blind the driver. Therefore, the rearview mirror has an additional lever at the bottom edge.

title: Hamas bo izpustil zadnjega živega ameriškega talca v Gazi
description: Hamas je sporočil, da bo izpustil zadnjega živega ameriškega talca v Gazi, Edana Alexandra, izraelsko-ameriškega vojaka, ki je bil ugrabljen 7. oktobra 2023.
title_translated: Hamas will release the last live US hostage in Gaza
description_translated: Hamas has announced that he would release the last live US hostage in Gaza, Edan Alexander, an Israel-American soldier who was abducted 7 October 2023.

title: V Sloveniji še menjajo - 180 minut pred koncem prvenstva padla trenerska glava
description: Poraz v Ljubljani je bil usoden. Več na Ekipa.si
title_translated: They still change in Slovenia - 180 minutes before the end of the championship, the coaching head fell
description_translated: The defeat in Ljubljana was fatal. More on team.si

title: "Polarizacija bo odslej še bolj izrazita!"
description: SDS je po besedah direktorja podjetja Valicon in analitika javnega mnenja Andraža Zorka na referendumu o dodatkih k pokojninam umetnikov dosegla svoj cilj in uspešno preštela glasove podpore. Političnih posledic za vladno koalicijo ne pričakuje. Bo pa v mesecih do volitev polarizacija še bolj izrazita, volitve prihodnje leto pa zelo zanimive, meni.
title_translated: "Polarization will now be even more pronounced!"
description_translated: According to the director of Valicon and the public opinion analyst Andraž Zork, the SDS achieved its goal and successfully counted the votes of support in a referendum on the supplements of artists. He does not expect political consequences for the government coalition. However, in the months until the elections, polarization will be even more pronounced, and the elections next year will be very interesting, he believes.

title: V Socialnih demokratih zaskrbljeni nad rezultati referenduma
description: Spremljamo aktualne novice doma in na tujem. Vse na enem mestu.
title_translated: In the Social Democrats concerned about the results of the referendum
description_translated: We follow current news at home and abroad. All in one place.

title: Prvaki vrnili udarec
description: V noči na ponedeljek sta bili v ligi NHL na sporedu dve srečanji. Branilci naslova Florida Panthers so na domačem terenu z 2:0 ugnali Toronto Maple Leafs in izid v zmagah izenačili na 2:2, Dallas Stars pa so s 5:2 premagali Winnipeg Jets in prišli do vodstva v seriji z 2:1.
title_translated: Champions returned the blow
description_translated: On Monday nights, two meetings were held in the NHL. The defenders of Florida Panthers titled Toronto Maple Leafs on their home field and equalized the score to 2: 2, and Dallas Stars beat Winnipeg Jets 5: 2 and came to the lead in the 2-1 series.

title: Za zaprtimi vrati v Švici: trgovinski sporazum med ZDA in Kitajsko?
description: Kitajska in Združene države Amerike sta se prvič po uvedbi carin ameriškega predsednika Donalda Trumpa v Švici pogovarjali o trgovinskem sodelovanju. Spomnimo, po 145-odstotnih ameriških carinah Kitajski, se je Peking odzval s 125-odstotnimi carinami Washingtonu. V Beli hiši so pogovore označili za trgovinski sporazum.
title_translated: Behind closed door in Switzerland: US -China Trade Agreement?
description_translated: For the first time since the launch of US President Donald Trump in Switzerland, China and the United States talked about trade cooperation. Recall, after 145 % of US customs, Chinese, Beijing responded with 125 % customs Washington. At the White House, the talks were described as a trade agreement.

title: Xi Jinping obljublja milijarde Latinski Ameriki za razvoj in energijo
description: Kitajski predsednik Xi Jinping v Pekingu gosti srečanje z voditelji in predstavniki držav Latinske Amerike in Karibov, na katerem se je zavzel za okrepitev vezi. Obenem je bil, ne da bi omenil ZDA, kritičen do nadlegovanja v obliki carinskih ali trgovinskih vojn. Države je pozval še, naj se uprejo zunanjemu vmešavanju.
title_translated: Xi Jinping promises billions of Latin America for development and energy
description_translated: Chinese President Xi Jinping is hosting a meeting with leaders and representatives of Latin America and Caribbean countries, where he advocated reinforcing the bonds. At the same time, without mentioning the US, he was critical of harassment in the form of customs or trade wars. He also urged countries to resist external interference.

title: Lahko risi po 14 letih premagajo Latvijce?
description: Sredi tretjega kroga je v Stockholmu brez točke samo še Slovenija. Če želijo risi obstati v elitni diviziji, morajo začeti zbirati točke. Ob 16. 20 čaka Slovenijo soočenje z Latvijo, neposredni prenos na TV SLO 2/MMC-ju.
title_translated: Can lynxes overcome Latvians after 14 years?
description_translated: In the middle of the third round, there is only Slovenia in Stockholm. If the lynx wants to exist in an elite division, they must start collecting points. At 16.

title: Jurij Hudolin: Mediteranski vrt
description: Nova pesniška zbirka Jurija Hudolina Mediteranski vrt sledi ekonaturalističnim tendencam v sodobni slovenski ustvarjalnosti, kakršne je že pred mnogimi leti začrtal pesnik Iztok Geister Plamen z reklom: naprej k naravi.
title_translated: Yuri Hudolin: Mediterranean Garden
description_translated: The new poetry collection of Yuri Hudolin Mediterranean Garden follows economarist tendencies in contemporary Slovenian creativity, as outlined many years ago by poet Iztok Geister Flame with said: Next to nature.

title: Carolina in Edmonton še korak bližje konferenčnemu finalu
description: Hokejisti moštev Carolina Hurricanes na vzhodu in Edmonton Oilers na zahodu so le še zmago oddaljeni od boja za naslov v konferenčnem finalu. V končnici severnoameriške lige NHL sta obe ekipi v polfinalu povedli s 3:1 v zmagah.
title_translated: Carolina and Edmonton a step closer to the conference finals
description_translated: Carolina Hurricanes hockey players in the east and Edmonton Oilers in the West are just a victory away from the fight for the title in the conference final. In the North American NHL playoffs, both teams in the semifinals led with 3: 1 in victories.

title: Odvzem vozniškega dovoljenja: zgodba, ki vam lahko spremeni življenje
description: Odvzem vozniškega dovoljenja lahko pomeni pravo nočno moro. Morda ste naredili napako, popili nekaj kozarcev preveč ali prekoračili hitrost. Nenadoma pride do odvzema vozniškega dovoljenja in s tem omejitev gibanja. A tudi ko se zdi, da je vse izgubljeno, obstajajo rešitve. Ena izmed njih je strokovna pravna pomoč, ki vam lahko pomaga ponovno sesti za volan.
title_translated: Driver's license: A story that can change your life
description_translated: Resignation of a driver's license can mean a nightmare. You may have made a mistake, drank some glasses too much or exceeded speed. Suddenly, there is a withdrawal of a driver's license and thus limitation of movement. But even when everything seems to be lost, there are solutions. One of them is professional legal aid that can help you again sit behind the wheel.

title: Knicksi na krilih izjemnega Brunsona še tretjič boljši od Bostona
description: Košarkarji moštev New York Knicks in Minnesota Timberwolves so le še zmago oddaljeni od finala vzhodne in zahodne konference. Newyorčani so s 121:113 na četrti tekmi doma premagali lanske branilce naslova Boston Celtics, medtem ko je bila Minnesota v gosteh s 117:110 boljša od Golden State Warriors.
title_translated: Knicks on the wings of an outstanding brunson for the third time better than Boston
description_translated: New York Knicks basketball players and Minnesota Timberwolves are just a remote victory away from the Eastern and Western Conference. With 121: 113 in the fourth game at home, the New Yorkers defeated last year's Boston Celtics title, while Minnesota was away with 117: 110 better than the Golden State Warriors.

title: Predsedniku okrožnega sodišča v Ljubljani očitajo več kršitev
description: Na mizi sodnega sveta je že štiri mesece sodba evropskega sodišča, da je predsednik okrožnega sodišča Marjan Pogačnik kršil pravila glede dodeljevanja zadev sodnikom. Enako kršitev je vrhovno sodišče zdaj ugotovilo še v enem primeru.
title_translated: The President of the Ljubljana District Court is accused of several violations
description_translated: At the Judicial Council, it has been a judgment of the European Court for four months that the President of the District Court, Marjan Pogačnik, violated the rules regarding the allocation of cases to the judges. The Supreme Court has now identified the same violation in another case.

title: Hčerka lovca na krokodile potrebovala nujno zdravniško pomoč
description: Hči najbolj znanega avstralskega lovca na krokodile, Steva Irwina, je bila prepeljana na urgenco, kjer so jo napotili na operacijo, je razkril njen mlajši brat Robert. Vnetje slepiča je bilo tudi razlog, da bo Bindi zamudila tradicionalni gala dogodek, ki ga vsako leto organizirajo v spomin na njunega očeta, ki je umrl leta 2006, ko ga je pičil skat.
title_translated: The daughter of a crocodile hunter needed urgent medical attention
description_translated: The daughter of the most famous Australian crocodile hunter, Steve Irwin, was transported to the emergency room, where she was referred for surgery, her younger brother Robert revealed. Binder inflammation was also the reason why Bindi would miss the traditional gala event, which is organized every year in memory of their father, who died in 2006 when he was scratched by skat.

title: Izrael po izpustitvi izraelskega vojaka nadaljeval bombardiranje Gaze. Napadena bolnišnica.
description: Izraelska vojska je po kratkem premoru, ko je Hamas izpustil izraelskega vojaka, danes nadaljevala napade na območje Gaze. Ponoči je napadla bolnišnico Naser na jugu območja. V napadu je bil ubit tudi novinar Hasan Eslaih.
title_translated: Israel continued the bombing of the gauze after the release of the Israeli soldier. An attacked hospital.
description_translated: After a short break, when Hamas released an Israeli soldier, the Israeli army continued the attacks on the Gaza area today. At night, she attacked Naser Hospital in the south of the area. The attack was also killed by journalist Hasan Eslai.

title: EBRD še nekoliko poslabšal napoved rasti slovenskega gospodarstva
description: Evropska banka za obnovo in razvoj je še malo poslabšala napoved letošnje rasti obsega slovenskega BDP. Če je februarja napoved oklestila za 0,6 odstotne točke in napovedovala 2,0-odstotno rast, zdaj pričakuje 1,9-odstotno krepitev gospodarske dejavnosti.
title_translated: EBRD further deteriorated the announcement of the growth of the Slovenian economy
description_translated: The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development has made a little deterioration in the forecast of this year's growth of Slovenian GDP. If in February the forecast was 0.6 percentage points and predicted 2.0 % growth, it is now expecting a 1.9 % strengthening of economic activity.

title: Mi, socialisti!: Militaristične politike slovenske vlade večina državljanov ne podpira
description: Stranka Mi, socialisti!, ki jo ustanavlja poslanec Miha Kordiš, pripravlja zahtevo za sklic referenduma o povečevanju vojaških izdatkov Slovenije. Podpise za referendum zbirajo prek spleta, v četrtek se bo začelo tudi zbiranje podpisov na terenu.
title_translated: We, Socialists!
description_translated: The party, socialists!, Established by MP Miha Kordiš, is preparing a request for a referendum referendum on the increase of military expenditures of Slovenia. Signatures for referendum are collected online, and on Thursday the collection of signatures in the field will begin.

title: Zloglasnima bratoma Menendez spremenjena kazen - bosta po 30 letih odkorakala na prostost?
description: Po 35 letih dobiva saga bratov Menendez nov obrat potem, ko je sodnik znižal kazni Eriku in Lylu, ki prestajata dosmrtno zaporno kazen za umor svojih staršev v njuni vili na Beverly Hillsu leta 1989. Brata tako zdaj lahko zaprosita za pogojni izpust.
title_translated: The infamous Menendez brothers changed punishment - will they go to freedom after 30 years?
description_translated: After 35 years, the Saga of the Menendez brothers gets a new turn after the judge has reduced his sentences to Erik and Lylo, who is serving a life -long prison sentence for the murder of his parents at their villa in Beverly Hills in 1989. The brothers can now ask for conditional discharge.

title: Povzročitelj smrti električarja obsojen na 15 mesecev pogojnega zapora
description: Robert Salkić je bil na ljubljanskem okrožnem sodišču obsojen na 15 mesecev pogojnega zapora zaradi povzročitve smrti iz malomarnosti. Salkić je 2019 pri montiranju LCD-zaslona v Ljubljani z dvigalom dvignil električarja, ki ni nosil ustrezne zaščite. Električarju je spodrsnilo in je po padcu z višine umrl.
title_translated: The death of an electrician sentenced to 15 months of probation
description_translated: Robert Salkic was sentenced to 15 months of probation in Ljubljana District Court for causing negligence death. In 2019, Salkic lifted an electrician who did not carry adequate protection when mounting the LCD screen in Ljubljana. The electrician slipped and died after the fall from the height.

title: Nogometni sodnik posilil moškega!?! Pošast iz premier lige obsojena na devet let
description: Neverjetna, pravzaprav grozljiva, novica prihaja iz Otoka. Nekdaj sodil v premier ligi, zdaj odhaja v zapor. Več na Ekipa.si
title_translated: A football referee raped a man!?! Monster from the Premier League sentenced to nine
description_translated: Incredible, actually creepy, news comes from the island. He used to judge in the Premier League, now he is going to prison. More on team.si

title: Priznanji tudi na Gorenjsko
description: Na 15. kongresu zdravstvene in babiške nege na Brdu pri Kranju so priznanji podelili tudi dvema članicama Društva medicinskih sester, babic in zdravstvenih tehnikov Gorenjske.
title_translated: Acknowledgments to Gorenjska
description_translated: At the 15th Congress of Nursing and Midwifery in Brdo near Kranj, two members of the Society of Nurses, Midwives and Health Technicians of Gorenjska were also awarded.

title: Miša: V srcu sem nosila spomine na babičine nasvete in ljubezen
description: Za Mišo Koplovo je bil uspeh na individualnem izzivu osebna zmaga, hkrati pa poklon vsem, ki so jo podpirali na njeni poti. Posebej hvaležna je svoji babici, pravi kuharski mojstrici, ki ji je predala dragoceno kulinarično dediščino.
title_translated: Misha: In my heart I carried memories of Grandma's tips and love
description_translated: For Miša Koplova, success at the individual challenge was a personal victory, while giving a tribute to all who supported her in her path. She is especially grateful to her grandmother, a real chef who handed her a valuable culinary heritage.

title: Teden doživetij
title_translated: A week of experiences

title: Trump se je po napovedi odprave ameriških sankcij proti Siriji srečal s Šaro
description: Ameriški predsednik Donald Trump se je v Riadu srečal s sirskim voditeljem Ahmedom Al Šaro, potem ko so ZDA presenetljivo napovedale odpravo sankcij proti Siriji, kar je sprožilo praznovanja v Damasku.
title_translated: Trump has met Shara after the announcement of US sanctions against Syria
description_translated: US President Donald Trump met with Syrian leader Ahmed Al Sara in Riad after the US surprisingly announced the elimination of sanctions against Syria, triggering the celebrations in Damascus.

title: Svinjska ribica v gorčični omaki
title_translated: A pork fish in mustard sauce

title: Praznik srca v krogu najdražjih
description: V gostišču Brunarica na Kokrici je nedavno zazvenel prav poseben utrip – slavili so namreč 95. rojstni dan Katarine Sitar iz Šenčurja, ki je ta visoki jubilej praznovala v družbi svojih najbližjih, z nasmehom na obrazu in hvaležnostjo v srcu.
title_translated: Heart Feast in the Circle of the most expensive
description_translated: A special pulse recently sounded at the Brunarica Inn on Kokrica - the 95th birthday was celebrated by Katarina Sitar from Senčur, who celebrated this high anniversary in the company of her loved ones, with a smile on her face and gratitude in her heart.

title: Vlada o stanovanjski zakonodaji
description: Vlada bo obravnavala predloga zakona o financiranju in spodbujanju gradnje javnih najemnih stanovanj ter novele stanovanjskega zakona. Med drugim je predvidenih 100 milijonov evrov letno v 10 letih za gradnjo 20.000 javnih najemnih stanovanj ter spremembe pri neprofitni najemnini, da bi se omogočilo vzdrževanje najemnih stanovanj.
title_translated: Government on housing legislation
description_translated: The Government will consider the bill on the financing and promotion of the construction of public rental housing and the amendment of the housing law. Among other things, € 100 million is planned a year in 10 years for the construction of 20,000 public housing and changes in non -profit rent in order to allow rental housing to maintain.

title: Ali je res možno lasersko odstranjevanje dlak na napotnico
description: Lahko, da je bilo v preteklih letih opravljenih 100 posegov laserskega odstranjevanja dlak na napotnico, lahko pa samo eden. ZZZS namreč podatkov o tem sploh nima, na UKC Ljubljana pa so z odgovori skopi. Kot kaže, pa je očitno največ odvisno od osebnega ali napotnega zdravnika, ki lahko presodi, ali so pogoji za poseg izpolnjeni, in je estetika res zgolj stranski rezultat storitve.
title_translated: Is it really possible laser hair removal on a referral
description_translated: It may have been done in recent years 100 procedures for laser hair removal on a referral, but only one can. Namely, the HIIS does not have any information about it at all, but at UCC Ljubljana it is scorned. However, it seems that the most dependent on a personal or referring physician who can judge whether the conditions for the intervention are fulfilled, and aesthetics is really merely a side result of the service.

title: Sodniku je prinesla skoraj 200.000 evrov
description: Na ljubljanskem sodišču so izrekli prve sodbe zaradi utaje davkov pri preprodaji prestižnih vozil.
title_translated: It brought almost € 200,000 to the judge
description_translated: The first judgments were made in the Ljubljana court for tax evasion in reselling prestigious vehicles.

title: Drastično? Severna Italija bo v mestih prepovedala starejše dizelske avtomobile.
description: Italijani letos jeseni uvajajo zakon, ki bo v mnogih mestih na severu države prepovedal vožnjo z avtomobili z dizelskimi motorji normativa Euro 5.
title_translated: Drastic? Northern Italy will prohibit older diesel cars in cities.
description_translated: The Italians are introducing a law this fall, which will forbidden in many cities in the north of the country with diesel cars for Euro 5.

title: Manj prometa, več smeha: lestvica otrokom mobilnostno prijaznih mest
description: Otroci potrebujejo varne poti v šolo in na športne aktivnosti pa v najljubše parke v mestu, da si privoščijo oddih od betona v mestih. Katera mesta v Evropi so za otroke mobilnostno najbolj zelena in varna? In kje je slovenska prestolnica? To razkriva poročilo, ki ga je objavila evropska nevladna organizacija Clean Cities.
title_translated: Less traffic, more laughter: a scale of children of mobile -friendly places
description_translated: Children need safe paths to school and on sports activities to their favorite parks in the city to afford a break from concrete in cities. Which cities in Europe are the most green and safe for children? And where is the Slovenian capital? This is revealed by a report published by the European NGOs Clean Cities.

title: Zapletena politična pot Uberja do slovenskih cest
description: Ali bo platformi Uber, ki povezuje ponudnike prevoza in ljudi, v tretje uspelo? Veleposlaništvo Združenih držav Amerike je za naslednji teden napovedalo prihod multinacionalke Uber v Slovenijo, ki se je v zadnjih desetih letih že trikrat želela prebiti na slovenski trg. Njihov poskus se je prvič izjalovil zaradi slovenske zakonodaje, drugič je zakonski okvir za ameriško platformo pripravila Janševa vlada, a ga je nato razveljavila trenutna oblast s premierjem Robertom Golobom na čelu, slovenski taksisti pa zdaj opozarjajo na pretekle sporne prakse Uberja v drugih državah. Kaj prihod Uberja pomeni za Slovenijo in na kaj opozarjajo taksisti?
title_translated: The complex political path of Uber to Slovenian Roads
description_translated: Will the Uber platform, which connects transport providers and people, will succeed in the third? The United States Embassy has announced the arrival of Uber multinationals next week to Slovenia, which has wanted to break into the Slovenian market in the last ten years. Their attempt was first made due to Slovenian legislation, the second time the legal framework for the US platform was prepared by the Janša government, but then repealed by the current authority with Prime Minister Robert Golob at the helm, and the Slovenian taxi drivers are now pointing to past controversial practices of Uber in other countries. What does Uber's arrival mean for Slovenia and what is taxi drivers pointing to?

title: Boj za milijone ali prirejeni javni razpisi?
description: Milijoni evropskega denarja bodo šli za digitalizacijo zdravstva. Pri njihovi delitvi na podlagi javnih razpisov pa se ministrstvo za zdravje sooča z očitki domnevnega prirejanja naročil določenim podjetjem, med drugim tudi v primeru nakupa programa za dispečerske službe. Ali želi ministrstvo za zdravje res kupiti drag program, ki ga ne potrebujemo? Pri pripravi razpisa je sodeloval zunanji svetovalec, v preteklosti omenjen v zvezi s koruptivnimi tveganji v ljubljanskem UKC. V tem na ministrstvu za zdravje ne vidijo težav, vse očitke prirejanja razpisov pa odločno zavračajo.
title_translated: Fight for millions or adapted calls?
description_translated: Millions of European money will go for the digitization of healthcare. In their division on the basis of public tenders, the Ministry of Health is facing allegations of alleged organization of orders to certain companies, including in the case of purchasing a dispatching program. Does the Ministry of Health really want to buy an expensive program we don't need? An external advisor participated in the preparation of the call, mentioned in the past in relation to corrupt risks in the Ljubljana UKC. The Ministry of Health does not see problems at this, and all the allegations of the tendering are firmly rejected.

title: Demi Moore znan prizor v Charliejevih angelčkih posnela s posebno prošnjo
description: Hollywoodska zvezdnica Demi Moore je v času svoje dolge kariere posnela nekaj zelo uspešnih filmov, med te pa sodi tudi vloga v franšizi Charliiejevi angelčki. 62-letnica je nedavno gostovala v oddaji soigralke Drew Barrymore, s katero sta leta 2003 ob Cameron Diaz in Lucy Lu zaigrali v drugem delu franšize, razkrila pa je tudi posebno prošnjo, ki jo je imela za ustvarjalce.
title_translated: Demi Moore famous scene in Charlie's angels recorded with a special request
description_translated: Hollywood star Demi Moore has made some very successful films during her long career, including the role in Charliie's franchise. The 62-year-old recently appeared on the show Drew Barrymore, who played in the second part of the franchise in 2003 with Cameron Diaz and Lucy Lu, and also revealed a special request she had as creators.

title: Nagrada za poslušnost Dallasa? 'Nico je ves čas vedel, da se bo to zgodilo'
description: Odhod Luke Dončića v Los Angeles Lakerse mnogim še vedno ni smiseln. Posledičen padec, pravzaprav potop njegovega nekdanjega moštva Dallas Mavericks po njegovem prisilnem odhodu je bil posledično za mnoge pričakovan. A štiri kroglice na loteriji, ki je odločila zaporedje izborov moštev na prihajajočem naboru, so vse spremenile. V trenutku, ko so Mavericksi ugotovili, da bo poleti nov član njihovega moštva postal eden najbolj nadarjenih mladih košarkarjev v zadnjih letih Cooper Flagg, je prihodnost na videz izgubljene franšize postala veliko bolj svetla. Teorije zarote, v katerih so mnogi iskali razloge za na videz nesmiselno odločitev Mavericksov, pa so znova planile na površje.
title_translated: Reward for Dallas obedience? 'Nico knew all the time that this would happen'
description_translated: The departure of Luka Doncic to Los Angeles Lakers still does not make sense. The resulting fall, in fact, the dive of his former Dallas Mavericks team after his forced departure was consequently expected for many. But four balls on the lottery, which decided the sequence of team selections in the upcoming set, changed everything. The moment the Mavericks found that a new member of their team will become one of the most talented young basketball players in recent years, Cooper Flagg, the future of the seemingly lost franchise has become much brighter. The conspiracy theories, in which many sought reasons for a seemingly pointless decision of the Mavericks, were again planning to the surface.

title: Dončiću bodo Lakersi pripeljali veliko pomoč - takole kličejo moža, ki bo iz Luke naredil stroj

title: Kako daleč je razvoj v laboratoriju vzgojenega mesa?
description: Proizvodnja gojenega mesa danes še ni povsem utečena in razširjena, zato tudi njegova cena še ni konkurenčna. A strokovnjaki s področja celičnega kmetijstva so prepričani, da bo "nova hrana" z leti postala nekaj povsem običajnega.

description_translated: Production of cultivated meat is not yet fully established and widespread, so its price is not yet competitive. But experts in the field of cellular agriculture are convinced that "new food" will become something out of the ordinary over the years.

title: Rusi in Ukrajinci v Istanbulu na pogovor brez predsednikov

Pogajanja so bila sprva načrtovana za četrtek, a se ruska in ukrajinska delegacija nista sestali.

description_translated: Istanbul is expected to take direct negotiations between Ukraine and Russia, which will otherwise include neither Russian President Vladimir Putin nor Ukrainian President Volodimir Zelenski. The negotiations were initially planned for Thursday, but the Russian and Ukrainian delegations did not meet.

title: Carolini uspelo, Winnipeg še upa
description: Hokejisti Carolina Hurricanes so v peti tekmi drugega kroga končnice v severnoameriški ligi NHL premagali Washington Capitals s 3:1 in se s skupnim izidom s 4:1 v zmagah uvrstili v konferenčni finale na vzhodu. V zahodni konferenci so Winnipeg Jets na domačem ledu s 4:0 premagali Dallas Stars in v zmagah znižali na 2:3. Kot prvi si je vstopnico za konferenčni finale zagotovil krvnik LA Kings Edmonton Oilers.
title_translated: Carolini succeeded, Winnipeg still hopes
description_translated: Carolina Hurricanes hockey players beat Washington Capitals in the fifth game of the second round in the North American NHL by 3: 1 and qualified for the conference finals in the east with a total score of 4: 1. In the Western Conference, Winnipeg Jets defeated Dallas Stars on home ice 4-0 and reduced to 2: 3 in victories. As the first, the ticket for the conference finals was secured by La Kings Edmonton Oilers.

Domači so s 86:85 tesno zmagali in povedli v seriji na dve zmagi. Sedaj je žogica na strani Ljubljančanov, ki v domačih Stožicah – le-te naj bi bile po nekaterih informacijah lepo polne – lovijo zmago za nadaljevanje sezone v regionalni ligi. title: Zaradi kolkov niso tekli, ampak hodili
description: Da lahko človek dobi svojo prvo medaljo tudi v pozni starosti, dokazujejo Nizozemci, ki so premagovali ovire in dali vse od sebe na prav posebni tekmi. Zaradi slabše delujočih kolkov in kolen niso tekli, ampak hodili. Nekateri so potrebovali več pomoči, zato so jih na invalidskih vozičkih potiskali. Kot so povedali udeleženci tekme na 200 metrov, vsi se bližajo devetdesetim letom, je bilo naporno, padale so primerjave z maratonom, bilo pa je tudi nekaj zdrave tekmovalnosti, še posebej med zakonci.
title_translated: They did not run but walked but walked
description_translated: The Dutch, who have overcome obstacles and did their best in a very special match, is evidenced by the fact that one can get their first medal even at a late age. Due to the poorly working hips and knees, they did not run but walk. Some needed more help, so they were pushed on wheelchairs. According to the participants of the 200 meters match, everyone was nearing the nineties, it was arduous, compared to the marathon, and there were some healthy competitiveness, especially among spouses.

title: Petrol v prvem četrtletju podvojil čisti dobiček
description: Skupina Petrol je v prvem četrtletju ustvarila 1,5 milijarde evrov prihodkov od prodaje, kar je štiri odstotke več kot v enakem obdobju lani. EBITDA se je zvišal za slabo tretjino na 67 milijonov evrov, čisti dobiček skupine pa se je več kot podvojil na 31 milijonov evrov. V Petrolu so ob tem znova pozvali k spremembi regulacije.
title_translated: Petrol in the first quarter doubled the net profit
description_translated: The Petrol Group generated EUR 1.5 billion in sales in the first quarter, which is four percent more than in the same period last year. EBITDA increased by less than a third to € 67 million, and the net profit of the group more than doubled to € 31 million. At Petrol, they again called for a change in regulation.

title: Stanovanjska zakonodaja: Kaj prinaša in komu koristi?

description_translated: The new housing legislation in Slovenia, confirmed by the Government, brings significant changes in the field of financing and promoting the construction of public rental housing. This law will provide more stable financing and bring nearly 2000 new apartments across Slovenia, together with other reliefs for municipalities.

Potrdili so, da bo nov sistem zaživel prihodnje leto, njegovo delovanje pa bodo testirali letošnjo jesen. Napovedali so tudi morebitno drugo fazo z ureditvijo parkiranja na drugih površinah.

description_translated: The Ministry of Infrastructure, together with the municipality of Kranjska Gora, presented the planned traffic arrangement at the Vršič pass this week at the public stand. They confirmed that the new system will come to life next year, and its operation will be tested this fall. They also announced a possible second phase by arranging parking on other surfaces.

title: Finci in Latvijci že zgodaj v boj, Slovence pa zanima predvsem tekma Francije
description: Sobotni spored v skupini A v Stockholmu se začenja ob 12.20 s tekmo med Finsko in Latvijo, ki obe potrebujeta zmago v boju za četrtfinale. Na zgodnjepopoldanski tekmi v Herningu bosta takrat palice prekrižali ZDA in Nemčija, ki sta trenutno na mestih, ki zagotavljajo četrtfinale. Slovenci, ki imajo danes tekmovanja prost dan, bodo pozorni na popoldansko tekmo Francije in Švedske. Upali bodo, da Francozi ne presenetijo gostiteljev Švedov, saj bi se s tem njihova pot do morebitnega obstanka otežila. Slovenci bodo znova na delu v nedeljo ob 16.20, ko se bodo pomerili z Avstrijci, v ponedeljek ob 16.20 pa sledi zanje zadnja tekma prvenstva proti Francozom. At the early -summer match in herning, the bars will then be crossed by the United States and Germany, which are currently in places that provide quarterfinals. Slovenians who have a day off today will pay attention to the afternoon match of France and Sweden. They will hope that the French do not surprise the hosts of the Swedes, as this would make their path to a possible existence. The Slovenians will be at work on Sunday at 16.20, when they will compete with the Austrians, and on Monday at 16.20 they will follow the final match against the French. The top four teams of each group are advanced to the quarterfinals, and the last -ranked fell into the lower rank of competitions.

title: Moč skupnosti geslo letošnjega mednarodnega dneva boja proti homofobiji
description: "Tragična resnica je, da sta nasilje in diskriminacija še vedno del vsakdanjega življenja milijonov LGBTIQ+ oseb po vsem svetu," je v poslanici ob mednarodnem dnevu boja proti homofobiji, transfobiji in bifobiji zapisal generalni sekretar ZN-a Guterres.
title_translated: Power Community Password this year's International Day Fight Homophobia
description_translated: "The tragic truth is that violence and discrimination are still part of the daily lives of millions of LGBTIQ people around the world," UN Secretary General Gutterres wrote in an EP on International Day for Homophobia, Transfobia and Bifobia.

title: Benjamin Šeško lovi zadnji vlak za Evropo
description: Danes se bo v Nemčiji odvil še zadnji, 34. krog bundeslige. Naslov so si že zagotovili nogometaši Bayerna iz Münchna, drugo mesto pa bo zasedel Bayer iz Leverkusna, katerega bo zadnjič pred selitvijo k Real Madridu vodil Xabi Alonso. Obeta se še napet boj za ligo prvakov med Eintrachtom, Freiburgom in Borussio Dortmund, pomembno delo pa čaka tudi Benjamina Šeška z RB Leipzigom, ki je trenutno sedmi, lahko pa se še zavihti do petega mesta in pozicije, ki zagotavlja igranje v ligi Europa.
title_translated: Benjamin Shesko hunts the last train for Europe
description_translated: Today, the last, 34th round of the Bundeslige will take place in Germany. The title has already been secured by Bayern football players from Munich, and second place will be taken by Bayer from Leverkusen, which will be led by Xabi Alonso for the last time before moving to Real Madrid. There is also a tense fight for the Champions League between Eintracht, Freiburg and Borussio Dortmund, and important work is also waiting for Benjamin Šeška with RB Leipzig, who is currently seventh, but can also swing to the fifth place and position, which provides playing in the Europa League.

title: Grda resnica o energetskih izkaznicah
description: Ali je energetska izkaznica sama sebi namen in le nepotreben strošek lastnika, ki prodaja nepremičnino, kot so ji očitali že ob uveljavitvi? Razkrivamo, kaj so ugotovili v obsežni raziskavi na terenu.
title_translated: Ugly truth about energy cards
description_translated: Is the energy certificate itself an end in itself and only an unnecessary cost of the owner who sells the property, as they were accused at the time of its entry into force? We reveal what they found out in extensive field research.

title: Na poti v Vatikan okoli 200 delegacij, tudi premier Golob
description: Papež Leon XIV. bo danes z umestitveno mašo uradno začel svoj pontifikat. V Vatikanu ob tej priložnosti pričakujejo okoli 150 tisoč vernikov, okoli 200 delegacij in monarhe z vsega sveta. V Rimu bodo veljali poostreni varnostni ukrepi. Slovensko delegacijo bo vodil premier Robert Golob, slovensko Cerkev bo zastopal škof Andrej Saje.
title_translated: On the way to the Vatican, about 200 delegations, including Prime Minister Golob
description_translated: Pope Leon XIV. will officially start his pontiff today with a placement Mass. About 150,000 believers, about 200 delegations and monarchs from all over the world are expected in the Vatican on this occasion. Invested security measures will be subject to Rome. The Slovenian delegation will be led by Prime Minister Robert Golob, and the Slovenian Church will be represented by Bishop Andrej Saje.

title: Jadrnica vojaške mornarice trčila ob Brooklynski most: umrla dva mornarja, več ljudi ranjenih #video
description: Šolska jadrnica mehiške vojaške mornarice je sinoči trčila ob Brooklynski most v New Yorku, pri čemer sta umrla dva mornarja, najmanj 19 ljudi je ranjenih, od tega štirje huje, je medijem potrdila newyorška gasilsko-reševalna služba. Most ni bil resneje poškodovan in so ga nekaj ur po trčenju znova odprli za promet.
title_translated: A military navy boat collided against the Brooklyn Bridge: Died two sailors, more people wounded
description_translated: The school sailboat of the Mexican Navy collided last night against the Brooklyn Bridge in New York, killing two sailors, at least 19 people were injured, of which four were worse, the New York firefighting service confirmed to the media. The bridge was not more seriously damaged and was reopened for traffic several hours after the collision.

title: Razgatlioglu slavil na Češkem: Najboljša dirka sezone!
description: Sobotni dan petega dirkaškega vikenda na Češkem v razredu Superbike je minil s prevlado turškega dirkača Topraka Razgatliogluja. Na dirkališču Autodrom Most je namreč dosegel svojo peto zmago v sezoni in deveto na tem prizorišču ter 62. v karieri razreda Superbike. S tem dosežkom je le še zmago oddaljen od Alvara Bautiste, ki jih ima 63. Ga lahko prehiti že v nedeljo? Ne zamudite pestrega dogajanja na VOYO.
title_translated: Results celebrated in the Czech Republic: the best race of the season!
description_translated: Saturday's day of the fifth racing weekend in the Czech Republic in the Superbike class passed with the dominance of the Turkish racer Toprak Razzhatlioglu. At the Autodrom Bridge, he achieved his fifth victory of the season and ninth in this scene and 62. With this achievement, only the victory is away from Alvar Bautiste, who has 63. Can he overtake him on Sunday? Don't miss out on VOYO.

title: Tretji del druge sezone nadaljevanke Volčji dvorec – nedelja ob 20.00 na TV SLO 1 in na RTV 365
description: Oktobra 1936 na severu Anglije izbruhnejo nemiri. Uporniki so nezadovoljni, ker se je Henrik odvrnil od katoliške vere in zapira samostane ter si prilašča imetje. Zahtevajo, da kralj spet prizna Mary za zakonsko hčer in jo nastavi za prestolonaslednico.

description_translated: In the northern of England, unrest in the north of England. The rebels are dissatisfied because Henrik turned away from the Catholic religion and closes the monasteries and seizes possessions. They demand that the king again admit Mary for his married daughter and set it as a Crown Prince.

title: Dokumentarni film Naravni parki Slovenije: Krajinski park Kolpa – ponedeljek ob 17.50 na TV SLO 1
description: Kolpa velja v slovenskem merilu za najbolj ohranjeno reko. Je posebno ohranitveno območje s pestrimi vodnimi in obvodnimi življenjskimi prostori in osrednja žila krajinskega parka. . Najlepše jo spoznamo v spustu po njeni strugi.

description_translated: Kolpa is considered to be the most preserved river on the Slovenian scale. It is a special conservation area with a varied water and bypass habitats and the central vein of the landscape park. . We get to know her best in the descent down her riverbed.

title: Noro, kako uspešni so pri Akrapoviču
description: "Zmagaj v nedeljo, prodaj v ponedeljek." Kaj so prednosti podjetja Akrapovič pred konkurenco, da največji mojstri dirkaškega sveta - Honda, Yamaha, Ducati ali BMW po izpuhe pridejo nikamor drugam kot v Ivančno Gorico? In addition to the answer, the head of the competitive support department also entrusted us with the trend of the new 'brake', which has the latest exhaust ...

title: Električni tovornjaki v Sloveniji prinašajo več posla
description: Električne tovornjake v slovenski logistiki danes lahko preštejemo na prste ene roke. Razlog za tako majhno prisotnost je večplasten. Ponudba sicer obstaja in se bo v prihodnjih letih še razširila. Vse več slovenskih podjetij si zaradi zmanjšanja skupnega ogljičnega odtisa želi, da bi njihovo blago prevažali električni tovornjaki.
title_translated: Electric trucks in Slovenia bring more business
description_translated: Electric trucks in Slovenian logistics today can be counted on one hand. The reason for such a small presence is multifaceted. The offer exists and will continue to expand in the coming years. More and more Slovenian companies want to carry their goods to electric trucks due to a reduction in a joint carbon footprint.

title: Slovenci na tekmi za biti ali ne biti: šteje le zmaga
description: Pred slovensko hokejsko reprezentanco je zadnja in hkrati odločilna tekma svetovnega prvenstva elitne skupine v Stockholmu. Ob 16.20 ji bo nasproti stala Francija. Matematika je preprosta. Zmagovalec bo obstal med hokejsko smetano, poraženec pa bo končal na zadnjem mestu skupine in se preselil v nižji rang tekmovanja, divizijo I. Slovenci so do zdaj obstali le dvakrat, zadnjič pred 20 leti, ko je bil še drugačen sistem tekmovanja.
title_translated: Slovenians in a match to be or not to be: only the victory counts
description_translated: In front of the Slovenian hockey team is the last and at the same time decisive match of the World Championship of the Elite Group in Stockholm. At 16.20, France will stand opposite her. Mathematics is simple. The winner will remain among the hockey cream, and the loser will finish in the last place and move to the lower ranking of the competition, Division I. The Slovenes have only been twice twice, the last time 20 years ago, when it was a different system of the competition.

title: Netanjahu: Izrael bo prevzel nadzor nad celotno Gazo

V odzivu je Simion priznal poraz, a obenem obljubil nadaljevanje boja za Romunijo.

description_translated: The far right of Eurosceptic George Simion, the winner of the first round of the presidential election in Romania, had to acknowledge the superiority in Sunday's second round to the middle mayor of Bucharest Nicusor Dan, who received just under 54 % support. In response, Simion acknowledged defeat, but at the same time promised to continue the fight for Romania.

He earned six Emmy nominations for a role in the Health series, and his character was one of the few to appear in each episode.

description_translated: The Belgian and European capital is facing a growing wave of violence, especially shooting showdowns, which has led the new Government for the Minister of Security and Internal Affairs to his career diplomat Bernard Quintin. The latter admits that the city is in a catastrophic state.

title: Težko bi jim rekli hribi, a pogled z njih dalež seže
description: V posodobljenem planinskem vodniku Slovenska Istra in Kras je 45 izletov. Opisuje svet, ki ga ni mogoče omejiti na doživljanje narave.

description_translated: There are 45 trips in the updated mountain guide Slovenska Istria and Karst. It describes a world that cannot be limited to nature experience.

title: Sanje velikanov ali kako je videti trboveljski dimnik skozi oči umetnikov
description: Sanje velikanov je naslov razstave, ki v ospredje postavlja trboveljski dimnik skozi oči umetnikov, ki na svoj način skozi umetnost in znanost razmišljajo o mogočnosti spomenika industrijske dediščine in o posledicah na okolje.

description_translated: The dream of giants is the title of an exhibition that puts at the forefront of the Trbovlje chimney through the eyes of artists, who, in their own way through art and science, think about the might of the industrial heritage monument and the consequences of the environment.

title: Želite spoznati igralce Skrito v raju? Se vidimo v Cityparku!
description: 22. maj je dan, ko se mnogim gledalcem serije Skrito v raju uresniči ultimativna želja – spoznati svoje najljubše igralce. Gaja Filač, Matej Zemlič, Aleš Valič, Sabina Kogovšek, Blaž Valič, Melani Mekicar and others, who participated in the creation of a popular series that can be watched on Monday and Friday, come to Citypark Ljubljana. Want a signature or selfie? See you at 5pm!

This has been particularly evident after two electric eclipses in larger areas lately. In order to enhance cooperation in this field, this week in Brussels, I hosted the EMIF event with my colleague, at which we and the representatives of the European Commission and Agencies, [...] The Post (we received) the novel Tomc: Together for the connected and resistant European energy market Appeared First on Democracy.

title: Zaradi grozečega plazu kravo Loni izpod švicarskega gorovja evakuirali s helikopterjem
description: Švicarsko gorsko vas Blatten ogroža plaz, zato so pristojni evakuirali vseh 300 prebivalcev, pa tudi vse živali – na pot na varno je tako moralo 190 ovac, 26 krav in okoli 20 zajcev. Ena kravica pa je imela privilegij: odpeljali so jo s helikopterjem.
title_translated: Due to the threatening avalanche, the cow Loni was evacuated by a helicopter under the Swiss mountains
description_translated: The Swiss mountain village of Blatten is threatened by an avalanche, so all 300 inhabitants were evacuated, as well as all animals - 190 sheep, 26 cows and about 20 rabbits have to go safely. One cow, however, had a privilege: she was taken by a helicopter.

title: Nova moška jama: moderna zatočišča za šport, prigrizke in zaslone
description: Nekoč je "moška jama" pomenila hladno klet z utripajočo televizijo, kavčem iz 90. let in mini hladilnikom, polnim toplega piva. Nič več. Nova različica je elegantnejša, pametnejša in narejena za več kot le gledanje športa. Po vsej Sloveniji in drugod moški spreminjajo proste sobe, garaže in celo vrtne lope v večnamenska zatočišča. To so kraji za gledanje tekem, igranje iger, uživanje v glasbi ali preprosto izginotje za uro ali dve po službi. Več na Ekipa.si
title_translated: New Men's Cave: Modern Shorts for Sports, Snacks and Screens
description_translated: Once upon a time, the "men's cave" was a cold cellar with a flashing television, a 90s couch, and a mini -brewed mini refrigerator. No more. The new version is more elegant, smarter and made for more than just watching sports. Throughout Slovenia and elsewhere, men turn free rooms, garages and even garden sheds into multifunctional shelters. These are places to watch matches, play games, enjoy music, or simply disappear for an hour or two after work. More on team.si

title: Nova ekipa Ilke za zadnji olimpijski izziv
description: Ilka Štuhec se je pred olimpijsko sezono okrepila v trenerskem štabu, vlogo glavnega trenerja je prevzel Denis Šteharnik, pomagal mu bo Boštjan Kline.
title_translated: The new Ilka team for the last Olympic challenge
description_translated: Ilka Štuhec strengthened herself at the coaching headquarters before the Olympic season, the role of head coach was taken by Denis Šteharnik, and will be assisted by Boštjan Kline.

title: Madeži na vetrobranskem steklu? Žuželk, ptic, rož bistveno manj kakor nekdaj
description: Se še spomnite, da je bilo vetrobransko okno nekoč polno žuželk, ki so kazile pogled na cesto? Tega se večinoma spominjajo starejši, saj danes tega pojava praktično ni več, ker je žuželk bistveno manj kot nekoč. To je zaskrbljujoče, upad pa beležijo tudi druge rastlinske in živalske vrste, opozarjajo znanstveniki. Ob svetovnem dnevu biodiverzitete opozarjamo na pomembnost in ogroženost biotske pestrosti našega planeta - naravnega bogastva brez katerega človeštvo ne more preživeti.
title_translated: Stains on the windshield? Insects, birds, flowers significantly less than ever
description_translated: Remember that the windshield was once full of insects that showed the view of the road? Mostly, the elderly remember this, because today this phenomenon is virtually no longer, because insects are significantly less than it used to be. This is worrying, and other plant and animal species are declining, scientists warn. On World Biodiversity Day, we point out the importance and threat to the biodiversity of our planet - natural wealth without which humanity cannot survive.

title: Britanka zaprta na Šrilanki: spanje med stenicami in na betonu, vedro namesto tuša ...
description: Mlada Britanka, ki ji na Šrilanki grozi več let zapora, potem ko so v njenih kovčkih našli mamila v vrednosti skoraj milijona evrov, kliče na pomoč. Iz zapora je sporočila, da je obupana in da so ji mamila podtaknili. Britanskim novinarjem je v intervjuju razkrila grozne razmere, v katerih se je znašla.
title_translated: British closed in Sri Lanka: sleep between stews and concrete, bucket instead of shower ...
description_translated: A young British woman, who threatens several years in prison in Sri Lanka after finding drugs worth almost a million euros in her suitcases, calls for help. She reported from the prison that she was desperate and that her drugs had been pushed. In an interview, she revealed to British journalists the terrible conditions she found herself.

title: Plača 2000 evrov neto, leta trdega dela, nato pa minimalna pokojnina?
description: Sindikati in nevladne organizacije so izrazili zaskrbljenost nad predlagano pokojninsko reformo, ki po njihovem mnenju zmanjšuje kupno moč upokojencev in podaljšuje delovno dobo. Minister Mesec se je zavezal k ponovnemu pregledu predlogov, medtem ko sindikati grozijo z referendumom, če njihove zahteve ne bodo upoštevane.
title_translated: Pays $ 2000 net, years of hard work and then a minimum pension?
description_translated: Trade unions and non -governmental organizations have expressed concern over the proposed pension reform, which, in their view, reduces the purchasing power of pensioners and extends the working life. The Minister Moon has committed himself to re -review the proposals, while the unions threaten the referendum if their requests are not taken into account.

Trade unions advocate the higher item of the lowest compensation than proposed by the government with the Ministry of Finance at the helm.

description: Ameriški predsednik Donald Trump je v svojem golf klubu v Virginiji gostil gala večerjo, na katero je povabil 220 največjih vlagateljev v njegov personalizirani meme kovanec. Po poročanju ameriških medijev so morali udeleženci v povprečju za sedež odšteti več kot milijon dolarjev. Zgroženi demokrati opozarjajo, da gre za "očiten konflikt interesov" in zaskrbljujoč dokaz, kako Trump izkorišča svoje predsedovanje za zasebno finančno korist.
title_translated: Trump is upset by 'crypto' gala dinner: 'orgy of corruption'
description_translated: US President Donald Trump hosted a gala dinner at his golf club in Virginia, inviting the 220 largest investors to his personalized meme coin. According to US media, participants had to deduct over $ 1 million on average. The appalled Democrats point out that it is a "obvious conflict of interest" and a worrying proof of how Trump uses his presidency for private financial gain.

title: Janši se nasmiha deseti mandat na čelu Slovenske demokratske stranke
description: Slovenska demokratska stranka (SDS) se bo v Ormožu sešla na 13. kongresu, tokrat pod sloganom Za ustavno večino razuma. Kongres, ki bo prvaku SDS-a Janezu Janši podelil deseti mandat na čelu stranke, bo predvsem v znamenju programskih usmeritev.
title_translated: Janshi smiles a tenth term at the head of the Slovenian Democratic Party
description_translated: The Slovenian Democratic Party (SDS) will meet in Ormož at the 13th Congress, this time under the slogan for the constitutional majority of reason. The congress, which will award the SDS champion Janez Janša for the tenth term at the head of the party, will be mainly marked by program guidelines.

The Congress, which will award the SDS champion Janez Janša for the tenth term at the head of the party, will be especially in the sign of program orientations. Delegates, expect about 700, are waiting for several resolutions led by the carrier entitled "Take the country back. Yours is."

title: Kaj storiti, ko potrebujete pravni nasvet? Preizkusite to odlično orodje
description: V vsakdanjem življenju nas lahko že najmanjša pravna zagata postavi pred veliko vprašanje: kaj zdaj? Ste podpisali pogodbo, ki je ne razumete povsem? Vas skrbi, da vam delodajalec krši pravice? Se zapletate v družinski ali dediščinski spor? V tistem trenutku si želimo enega: nekoga, ki ve, kaj dela – in ki mu lahko zaupamo.Na srečo takšna pomoč obstaja – hitro in strokovno. Spoznajte Pravni pomočnik, spletno aplikacijo, ki uporablja napredno umetno inteligenco, da vam ponudi takojšnjo pravno podporo kadarkoli in kjerkoli jo potrebujete.
title_translated: What to do when you need legal advice? Try this great tool
description_translated: In everyday life, the smallest legal conundrum can put us a big question: what now? Have you signed a contract that you do not fully understand? Are you worried that your employer violates your rights? Are you getting involved in a family or heritage dispute? At that moment, we want one: someone who knows what he is doing - and who can trust him. Well, such help exists - fast and professional. Learn a legal assistant, an online application that uses advanced artificial intelligence to offer you immediate legal support anytime and wherever you need it.

title: Spet slišati življenje: revolucija v slušnih aparatih
description: Naša čutila so ključna za stik s svetom – a njihove vrednosti se pogosto zavemo šele, ko začnejo pešati. Čeprav se največkrat zanašamo na vid, je prav izguba sluha tista, ki močno vpliva na kakovost življenja. Slabši sluh otežuje komunikacijo, ustvarja razdaljo med ljudmi ter pogosto vodi v občutke osamljenosti in družbene izključenosti.
title_translated: Again to hear life: revolution in hearing aids
description_translated: Our senses are key to contacting the world - but we often only realize their values ​​when they begin to walk. Although most often we rely on vision, it is hearing loss that has a profound effect on quality of life. Poor hearing makes it difficult to communicate, create a distance between people, and often leads to feelings of loneliness and social exclusion.

title: Dogodki, ki bodo spremenili vaš pogled na svet: preverite, kdaj prihajajo v vašo mesto
description: Pozor, vsi, ki vam je mar za zdravje oči! Zadnji teden maja in v prvih dveh tednih junija bo po Sloveniji potekala serija mikrodogodkov, kjer boste lahko brezplačno preizkusili napredno tehnologijo merjenja vida DNEye uveljavljenega podjetja Rodenstock in se seznanili z novostmi v svetu optike. V sodelovanju z izbranimi optikami, ki že uporabljajo tehnologijo DNEye, bodo s posebno prikolico, opremljeno z DNEye Scannerjem, obiskali različne kraje po Sloveniji. Na dogodkih bodo izvajali informativne meritve vida, poudarjali pomen rednih očesnih pregledov in vam predstavili biometrična korekcijska stekla, ki ponujajo popolnoma novo raven vidne izkušnje.
title_translated: Events that will change your worldview: Check when they come to your city
description_translated: Attention, everyone who cares about eye health! The last week of May and in the first two weeks of June will be a series of microdogies across Slovenia, where you will be able to test the advanced technology of measuring Vida Dneye Rodenstock and get acquainted with the innovations in the optics world. In collaboration with selected optics that already use Dobeye technology, they will visit various places around Slovenia with a special trailer equipped with Dobeye Scanner. The events will perform informative measurements of vision, emphasize the importance of regular eye examinations and present you biometric correction windows that offer a whole new level of visual experience.

title_translated: Green before leaving for Berlin announced the strengthening of domestic weapons production
description_translated: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz will host Ukrainian President Green in Berlin. According to some media outlets, Germany is expected to provide the attacked state with a new assistance. Green on Tuesday announced the strengthening of Ukrainian weapons production.

title: Baška grapa, neodkrit dragulj, je postala četrta slovenska gorniška vas
description: Slovenija je dobila četrto tako imenovano gorniško vas. V mednarodno mrežo Gorniške vasi je po sobotni slovesnosti v Stržiščah pod Črno prstjo vstopila Baška grapa. Slovenske gorniške vasi so že od prej Jezersko, Luče in Dovje-Mojstrana. "Baška grapa s svojo divjo, neukročeno lepoto, bogato kulturno in naravno dediščino ter pristnimi ljudmi predstavlja neodkrit dragulj slovenskega turističnega zemljevida," je poudaril podžupan Občine Tolmin in predsednik PD Podbrdo Tomaž Štenkler. Čas je, da jo planinci še bolje spoznamo!
title_translated: Baška grapa, an undiscovered gem, became the fourth Slovenian mountaineering village
description_translated: Slovenia received the fourth so -called mountaineering village. After the Saturday ceremony in Stržišče under the Black Finger, the Baška ravine entered the International Network of Mountain Village. The Slovenian mountain villages have been since earlier Jezersko, Luče and Dovje-Mojstrana. "The Baška ravine, with its wild, unmarried beauty, rich cultural and natural heritage and genuine people, represents an undiscovered gem of the Slovenian tourist map," said the Mayor of Tolmin and PD Podbrdo President Tomaž Štenkler. It's time for mountaineers to get to know her even better!

The green will also visit Berlin and meet with Chancellor Friedrich Merzem, who announced the elimination of restrictions on long -range weapons for Ukraine.

title: Zagorela hiša v Dupleku: škode za okoli 25 tisoč evrov
description: Na območju Maribora, po neuradnih informacijah v Spodnjem Dupleku, je v torek malo pred 11.30 zagorelo v kuhinji stanovanjske hiše. Požar so pogasili gasilci, policisti pa še zbirajo informacije o vzroku požara. Po nestrokovni oceni je nastalo za okoli 25 tisoč evrov škode, so danes sporočili s Policijske uprave Maribor.
title_translated: House in Duplek: Damage for about 25 thousand euros
description_translated: In the area of ​​Maribor, according to unofficial information in Lower Duplek, on Tuesday, shortly before 11.30, it burned in the kitchen of an apartment house. The fire was extinguished by firefighters and police officers are still collecting information about the cause of the fire. According to an unprofessional estimate, it was caused by about € 25,000 in damage, the Maribor Police Directorate said today.

title: V torek napaden tudi moški #video
description: Potem ko je medved, po naših informacijah medvedka z mladičkoma, v torek napadel in hudo poškodoval žensko, ljubljanski policisti poročajo o še enem napadu. He fled the side, and the bear caught up with him and scratched him and damaged him easily.

title: Od cerkve, graščine do vrtin vode – tudi v to je šel denar Uniorja
description: Želel je biti pomemben globalni igralec, a zabredel v milijonske dolgove. Cerkev na Rogli, polnilnici vode, tudi na Kosovu, pa graščina, terme, smučišče, umetni kolki – nekaj projektov poleg osnovne dejavnosti – kovaštva. Je res, da so bili na njegovem plačilnem seznamu tudi taki, ki v Uniorju sploh niso delali, posle pa dobivali le določeni dobavitelji? Bo vodstvu uspelo rešiti Unior pred potopom zaradi velikih izgub, revizija pa razkrila, ali je šlo za prirejanje poslovnih podatkov?
title_translated: From the church, the mansion to the wells of the water - even in that went unior money
description_translated: He wanted to be an important global player, but wandered into millions of debts. Church at Rogla, water filling station, including Kosovo, mansion, spa, ski resort, artificial hip - some projects in addition to the core business - blacksmithing. Is it true that there were also those who did not work in Unior at all, but only certain suppliers received business? Will the management manage to solve Unior from a dive due to major losses, and the audit revealed whether it was business data?

title: Golob na delovni obisk v Španijo
description: Predsednik vlade Robert Golob bo danes na delovnem obisku v Španiji. Gre za povratni obisk po tem, ko je februarja 2023 in aprila 2024 v Sloveniji gostil španskega kolega Pedra Sancheza. Golob bo ob tej priložnosti obiskal tudi sedež Svetovne turistične organizacije v Madridu.

description_translated: Prime Minister Robert Golob will be on a working visit in Spain today. It is a return visit after a Spanish colleague Pedro Sanchez hosted in February 2023 and April 2024 in Slovenia. The pigeon will also visit the headquarters of the World Tourist Board in Madrid on this occasion.

title: Liga NBA ima prvega finalista! Oklahoma pomendrala Dončićeve krvnike.

V petem srečanju konferenčnega finala na zahodu so doma nadigrali Minnesoto s 124:94 in izločili Volkove s 4:1 v zmagah. Znova je blestel MVP igralec sezone Shai Gilgeous-Alexander (34 točk), OKC pa je postala prva ekipa v zgodovini lige NBA, ki je v isti sezoni končnice zbrala kar štiri zmage z vsaj 30 točkami razlike.

description_translated: Oklahome City Thunder basketball players easily used the first final ball to break into the NBA grand finals. In the fifth meeting of the conference finals in the west, Minnesota was played at home with 124: 94 and eliminated wolves with 4: 1 in victories. Again, the MVP season of the season was Shai Gilgeous-Alexander (34 points), and OKC became the first team in the NBA history of the NBA, which in the same season of the playoffs collected as many as four wins with at least 30 points of difference.

title: Med Slovenci kroži zelo nevarno sporočilo: Kdor bo verjel, lahko izgubi vse
description: Bralka je na Facebooku prejela sporočilo, da je njen uporabniški račun delil prepovedano vsebino, zato bo trajno izbrisan v 24 urah. Priložena je bila povezava, na kateri bi se lahko pritožila na odločitev pošiljatelja sporočila, ki se je izdajal za Facebookovo umetno inteligenco. V paniki, da bo na Facebooku izgubila vse, je sledila navodilom, nato pa so ji neznanci iz tujine ukradli uporabniški račun.
title_translated: A very dangerous message is circulating among Slovenes: anyone who believes can lose everything
description_translated: The reader received a message on Facebook that her user account had shared forbidden content, so it will be permanently deleted within 24 hours. There was a link to complain to the sender's decision of the message, which was issued for Facebook's artificial intelligence. In a panic to lose everything on Facebook, she followed the instructions, and then strangers from abroad stole a user account.

title: Musk in Trump sta se razšla

Musk je na svojem družbenem omrežju X objavil, da se je njegov čas posebnega vladnega uslužbenca iztekel.

Musk published on his social network X that his time of a special government employee had expired.

title_translated: In Istanbul today, new direct talks between Russia and Ukraine
description_translated: Istanbul will be announced today for new direct talks between delegations of Russia and Ukraine, which are expected to discuss ways to end the war and proposals prepared by both countries. The Russian delegation will be led by Russian President Advisor Vladimir Medinski and Ukrainian Minister of Defense Ruststa.

description_translated: Police officers stopped and inspected the Turkish truck on Sunday night in the Upper Gruškov area and discovered 21 foreign citizens in the freight. One of them, a Turkish citizen, was dead.

title: Trump: Sporazum z Iranom ne bo dovoljeval bogatenja urana
description: Ameriški predsednik Donald Trump je v ponedeljek poudaril, da morebitni jedrski sporazum Iranu ne bo dovolil bogatenja urana, poroča francoska tiskovna agencija AFP. Iran je sicer v preteklosti večkrat zavrnil pozive k opustitvi bogatenja urana, a se hkrati zavezal, da ne namerava pridobiti jedrskega orožja.
title_translated: Trump: Agreement with Iran will not allow Uranus enrichment
description_translated: US President Donald Trump stressed on Monday that a potential nuclear agreement will not allow Iran to enrich Uranus, according to French news agency AFP. In the past, Iran has repeatedly rejected calls for abandoning the enrichment of uranium, but at the same time obliged that he did not intend to obtain nuclear weapons.

title: Slovenski Astech bo skrbel za prezračevalne naprave v avstrijskih predorih
description: Pred turistično sezono je avstrijski vzdrževalec avtocest Asfinag pregled delovanja sistemov v svojih predorih ponovno zaupal slovenskemu podjetju Astech. Astech bo skrbel za nadzor prezračevanja in pohlajevanja krmilno-regulacijskih sistemov avstrijskih predorov. Asfinag je avstrijsko državno podjetje, ki je odgovorno za upravljanje, vzdrževanje in gradnjo avtocest ter pobiranje cestnin. Z letošnjim izborom podjetja Astech je tako Asfinag potrdil Astechovo strokovnost in mu zaupal varnost ključne avstrijske infrastrukture.
title_translated: Slovenian Astech will take care of ventilation devices in Austrian tunnels
description_translated: Before the tourist season, the Austrian motorway maintenance maintained as a review of the operation of systems in its tunnels again entrusted to the Slovenian company Astech. Astech will take care of the control of the ventilation and praise of the control and regulation systems of the Austrian tunnels. Asfinag is an Austrian state -owned company that is responsible for managing, maintaining and building highways and picking tolls. With this year's selection of Astech, Asfinag was confirmed by Astech's professionalism and entrusted him with the security of key Austrian infrastructure.

title: Aktivisti ukradli voščeno podobo Macrona in ga postavili pred rusko veleposlaništvo

title: Jugozahod Turčije zbudil močan potres, ljudje v paniki skakali skozi okna
description: Potres z magnitudo 5,8 je zatresel tla v sredozemskem letovišču Marmaris na jugozahodu Turčije, je sporočila turška agencija za obvladovanje nesreč. Najmanj sedem ljudi je bilo poškodovanih, medtem ko so v paniki poskušali pobegniti skozi okna. 14-letna deklica je umrla po tem, ko je zaradi potresa doživela panični napad.
title_translated: Southwest of Turkey woke up a strong earthquake, people in panic jumping through the windows
description_translated: A magnitude 5.8 earthquake shook the ground at the Mediterranean resort of Marmaris in southwestern Turkey, the Turkish accident management agency said. At least seven people were injured, while in a panic they tried to escape through the windows. A 14-year-old girl died after she experienced a panic attack due to an earthquake.

title: Trije novi razpisi za prehod na obnovljive vire energije - med drugim tudi za naložbe v hranilnik

title_translated: Three new calls for transition to renewable energy sources - including investments in the storage
description_translated: Many subsidies are already available to transition to renewable energy, and three more calls are expected shortly, including for an independent investment in the storage. Namely, Slovenia relies primarily on electrification when lowering greenhouse gas emissions.
