description_translated: Pavel Rupar, Head of the Initiative Voice of Retirement: “I notice a terrible nervousness of people, we would be sure, everyone is salted, and they are barely aware that this is the result of a situation that is generally desperate! They take our deserved pensions every day without bad conscience, it has become natural, but that self -explanatory. Taking deserved pensions without bad conscience has become natural for granted!

title: Hči Brada in Angeline dokončno opustila očetov priimek
description: Shiloh je naslednja v vrsti otrok nekdaj priljubljenega para, Angeline Jolie in Brada Pitta, ki je opustila očetov priimek. Zahtevo za spremembo imena je vložila maja lani, odobrili so jo lanskega avgusta, na gledališkem listu enega od nastopov, za katerega je ustvarila koreografijo, pa se je zdaj podpisala z novim umetniškim imenom – Shi Joli.
title_translated: Daughter Chaddy and Angeline Finally abandoned his father's surname
description_translated: Shiloh is the next in a series of children of the once popular couple, Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt, who abandoned her father's surname. She filed for a name change in May last year, approved last August, and on the theater list of one of the performances for which she created choreography, she has now signed with a new artistic name - Shhi Joli.

title: Kako urediti popoln vrt za poletje: žari, pohištvo, zasaditve in zelenica brez skrbi
description: Poleti imamo več priložnosti za druženje na vrtu, sprostitev na udobnem ležalniku in uživanje v vonju sveže pokošene trave. Če si želite ustvariti zunanji prostor, ki bo navduševal z videzom in funkcionalnostjo, je zdaj pravi čas za akcijo.
title_translated: How to arrange the perfect garden for summer: grills, furniture, planting and greenery without worry
description_translated: In the summer, we have several opportunities to socialize in the garden, relax on a comfortable deck chair and enjoy the smell of freshly mowed grass. If you want to create an outdoor space that will impress with appearance and functionality, now is the right time for action.

title: Prvi resen preizkus za Novaka Đokovića
description: Na teniškem OP Francije se nadaljujejo četrtfinalni dvoboji in čakata nas dva zanimiva. V moškem delu bosta najprej igrala Jannik Sinner in Aleksander Bublik, v večernem delu pa še Novak Đoković in Aleksander Zverev.
title_translated: The first serious test for Novak Djokovic
description_translated: The quarterfinal duels continue on the French tennis Open and two interesting ones are waiting for us. The men's work will first be played by Jannik Sinner and Aleksander Bublik, and in the evening there will be Novak Djokovic and Aleksander Zverev.

title: Je bila žrtev tudi vaša hčerka? Daj se slikaj naga v ogledalu ...
description: Višje sodišče v Kopru je potrdilo zaporno kazen ajdovskemu tiktokerju Ireneju Bizjaku.
title_translated: Was the victim of your daughter too? Give yourself a picture in the mirror ...
description_translated: The Koper High Court upheld the prison sentence of Irene Bizjak.

title: V Ljubljani se danes pripravite na prometni kolaps
description: Kolesarska dirka po Sloveniji se bo začela z etapo od Pirana do Škofljice. Pot bo kolesarje vodila skozi Ljubljano.
title_translated: In Ljubljana, prepare for traffic collapse today
description_translated: The cycling race across Slovenia will start with the stage from Piran to Škofljica. The route will lead cyclists through Ljubljana.

title: TV-klinika z Davidom Zupančičem: Sladkor - ali ga res potrebujemo? – sreda ob 17.15 na TV SLO 1
description: Sladkor je naravni vir energije, vendar ob čezmernem uživanju lahko povzroči težave. Danes v prehrani pogosto uživamo preveč dodanih sladkorjev, ki se skrivajo v različnih predelanih živilih. Kako vplivajo na naše zdravje in kako najti ravnovesje?
title_translated: TV clinic with David Zupančič: Sugar - Do we really need it? - Wednesday at 5:15 pm on TV SLO 1
description_translated: Sugar is a natural source of energy, but with excessive consumption it can cause problems. Today, we often eat too much added sugars in the diet, which are hidden in various processed foods. How do they affect our health and how to find balance?

title: Trump zapira vrata: državljanom 12 držav prepovedal vstop v ZDA
description: Ameriški predsednik Donald Trump je v sredo državljanom 12 držav, med njimi Afganistana, Haitija in Irana, prepovedal vstop v ZDA, ker bi naj predstavljali grožnjo nacionalni varnosti, je sporočila Bela hiša. Še za sedem držav pa je uvedel delno prepoved. Ukrep bo stopil v veljavo v ponedeljek.
title_translated: Trump closes the door: Forbidden to citizens of 12 countries forbidden to enter the United States
description_translated: On Wednesday, US President Donald Trump banned citizens of 12 countries, including Afghanistan, Haiti and Iran from entering the United States because they were to pose a threat to national security, the White House said. For seven more countries, he introduced a partial ban. The measure will take effect on Monday.

title: Osvoji burger in pivo na tradicionalnem Staropramen pikniku! #nagradnaigra
description: Pridružite se nam na že 4. pikniku Staropramen, na katerem bomo skupaj nazdravili poletju! Po treh izjemno zabavnih piknikih in številnih zadovoljnih obiskovalcih letos pripravljamo še več: več okusov, več glasbe, več druženja – in seveda več Staropramna.
title_translated: Win a burger and beer at the traditional Staropramen picnic!
description_translated: Join us at 4. Picnic Staropramen, where we will toast together summer! After three extremely entertaining picnics and many satisfied visitors, this year we are preparing more: more flavors, more music, more socializing - and of course more Staropramna.

title: Nick Brandt: Fotografirati moram tam, kjer je še prisoten občutek upanja
description: Nosorog mirno stoji zadaj v meglici, nekaj metrov pred njim pa par z otrokom v naročju pozira kot za družinsko fotografijo v studiu. Le da se vse dogaja sredi kenijske puščave.
title_translated: Nick Brandt: I have to take pictures where there is still a sense of hope
description_translated: The rhinoceros stands calmly in the haze, and a few meters in front of him, the couple with a baby in his lap poses as a family photo in the studio. But everything is happening in the middle of the Kenyan desert.

title: Novak Đoković po začetnih težavah do polfinala s Sinnerjem
description: Na teniškem OP Francije se nadaljujejo četrtfinalni dvoboji in čakata nas dva zanimiva. V moškem delu je Jannik Sinner brez težav s 3:0 odpravil Aleksandra Bublika, v večernem delu pa je Novak Đoković izločil Aleksandra Zvereva.
title_translated: Novak Djokovic after the initial trouble to the semi -finals with Sinner
description_translated: The quarterfinal duels continue on the French tennis Open and two interesting ones are waiting for us. In the men's work, Jannik Sinner easily eliminated Alexander Bulk with 3-0, and in the evening Novak Djokovic eliminated Alexander Zvereva.

title: V Ronalda trčil invalid, udarec je bil neizbežen. Posnetek kroži (video)
description: Cristiano Ronaldo se je z reprezentančnimi soigralci v torek uvrstil v finale lige narodov. Več na Ekipa.si
title_translated: The disabled person collided with Ronalda, the blow was inevitable. Circle (video)
description_translated: Cristiano Ronaldo made it to the finals of the League of Nations with national teammates on Tuesday. More on team.si

title: Koga si komarji najraje izberejo za svojo 'žrtev'?
description: Koledarsko poletje se je začelo, druženje na prostem pa že kvarijo komarji. Koga si najraje izberejo za svojo žrtev? So to res ljudje s krvno skupino 0? Kateri dejavniki pa vplivajo na pogostost pikov?
title_translated: Who do mosquitoes prefer to choose for their 'victim'?
description_translated: The calendar summer has started, and outdoor socializing is already spoiling mosquitoes. Who do they prefer to choose for their victim? Are these really people with blood type 0? What factors, however, affect the frequency of dots?

title: Kylie Jenner po letih ugibanj razkrila podrobnosti povečanja prsi
description: Najmlajša članica klana Kardashian - Jenner je po letih ugibanj in govoric razkrila podrobnosti povečanja prsi. Kylie Jenner je na TikToku uporabnici, ki jo je spraševala za nasvet glede omenjenega lepotnega posega, v razdelku za komentarje natančno pojasnila, za kakšen tip umetnih prsi se je odločila in z odkritostjo navdušila javnost.
title_translated: Kylie Jenner revealed the details of breast enlargement after years
description_translated: The youngest member of Kardashian Klan - Jenner revealed the details of breast enlargement after years of guessing and rumors. Kylie Jenner explained to the Tiktok user, who asked her for advice on the aforementioned beauty intervention in the comment section exactly what type of artificial breast she had decided and impressed the public with honesty.

title: Bolečina v palcu na roki – najpogostejši vzroki težav
description: Palec na roki ima nezamenljivo vlogo pri opravljanju vsakodnevnih aktivnosti, saj nam omogoča prijemanje različnih predmetov in natančno rokovanje z njimi. Zaradi pomembne funkcionalne vloge lahko bolečina v palcu na roki močno vpliva na vaš vsakdan.
title_translated: Pain in the thumb on hand - the most common causes of trouble
description_translated: The thumb on the arm plays an irreplaceable role in performing everyday activities, as it allows us to adhere to different objects and accurately handle them. Due to its important functional role, pain in the thumb on your arm can greatly affect your everyday life.

title: Iščete poletno delo? Toliko vam morajo plačati po novem
description: Študentsko delo v razcvetu – preberite, zakaj se mladim letos še posebej splača del počitnic nameniti delu.
title_translated: Looking for summer work? So much have to pay for you new
description_translated: Student work in boom - read why young people are especially worthy of their holidays this year.

title: Ameriško-kanadska dokumentarna oddaja Iskanje najstarejšega DNK – četrtek ob 21.15 na TV SLO 1
description: Stoletja smo najboljše namige o življenju v pradavnini dobivali s fosili. Toda zdaj nam prelomno dognanje neomajnega danskega znanstvenika omogoča odpotovati milijone let v preteklost, v čas pred zadnjo ledeno dobo.
title_translated: US-Canada Documentary Searches Finding the Oldest DNA-Thursday at 9.15pm on TV SLO 1
description_translated: For centuries, we have received the best hints of life in ancient times with fossils. But now the groundbreaking finding of an unwavering Danish scientist allows us to travel millions of years in the past, before the last ice age.
